source: Bozjan Gear
target: Снаряжение Бозьи

source: At the Bozjan southern front, players can participate in large-scale encounters to help the Bozjan Resistance reclaim their homeland from the IVth Imperial Legion.
target: В Южном фронте Бозьи игроки принимают участие в массовых сражениях, чтобы помочь Сопротивлению Бозьи освободить их родину от IV-го Имперского Легиона.

source:
■Basic Rules
Players can enter Save the Queen areas solo or in a party. It is possible to form a party even after entering the instance.

■Requirements
A Disciple of War or Magic level 71 or higher is required to enter.

■Restrictions
Once inside, you are free to change to any Disciple of War or Magic that meets the requirements to enter. However, you cannot change jobs while participating in a critical engagement.

All forays in Save the Queen areas are level synced, with character levels adjusted to 80, and all equipment adjusted to item level 430. Furthermore, materia bonuses will be ignored, regardless of the item level of gear affixed with materia. Any experience points gained will apply to your job level prior to level sync.
target:
■Базовые правила
Игроки могут войти в зоны «Спасения Королевы» одни или в группе. Группу так же можно собрать внутри зоны.

■Требования
Чтобы войти необходим Адепт Битвы или Магии 71 уровня или выше.

■Ограничения
Войдя внутрь вы сможете переключиться на любого Адепта Битвы или Магии который соответствует требованиям. Но вы не можете менять профессию участвуя в критическом сражении.

Всё в зонах «Спасения Королевы» синхронизируется по уровню. С максимальным 80 уровнем адепта, и 430 уровнем снаряжения. Бонусы материи игнорируются вне зависимости от уровня снаряжения. Любые полученные очки опыта будут применяться к вашему уровню профессии до синхронизации уровня.

source:
Your reputation in Save the Queen areas is represented by your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Resistance rank<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

To increase your Resistance rank, you can participate in skirmishes and critical engagements to earn <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>mettle<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. After earning sufficient mettle, speak with the Resistance commander at any nearby encampment to be promoted. As you increase in rank, the Resistance's front line will advance, allowing you to explore new areas, as well as increase the capacity of the lost finds cache.

Your rank and mettle earned will be retained between visits─progress will not be lost when you depart Save the Queen areas.
target:
Ваша репутация в зонах «Спасения Королевы» отображается в виде <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Ранга Сопротивления<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

Чтобы повысить Ранг Сопротивления, нужно участвовать в стычках и критических сражениях чтобы заработать <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>очки подвигов<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Как только вы заработаете достаточно очков подвигов, поговорите с Командиром Сопротивления в ближайшем лагере для повышения. Повышая ранг, фронт сопротивления будет продвигаться дальше, позволяя изучить новые зоны и так же увеличивая хранилище затерянных находок.

Ваш ранг и очки подвигов будут сохраняться между посещениями ─ Прогресс не теряется после покидания зон «Спасения Королевы».

source:
Falling in battle will incur a penalty.

■Incapacitation Penalty
A portion of the mettle required to reach your next rank will be lost upon incapacitation.

■Return Penalty
After being incapacitated, using Return to retreat from the battlefield to a nearby encampment will incur an additional penalty of lost mettle. This penalty can also be incurred by leaving the instance while incapacitated.

The amount of mettle lost is dependent on your Resistance rank. It is worth noting, however, your rank cannot go down as a result of losing mettle. Furthermore, no penalty will be incurred below Resistance rank 5.
target:
Падение в бою повлечет за собой штраф.

■Штраф за падение
Небольшое количество очков подвигов будет потеряно при падении.

■Штраф за возврат
Если вы использовали возврат после падения, то это повлечет дополнительный штраф на очки подвигов. Этот штраф наложится и в случае покидания зоны будучи поверженным.

Количество потерянных очков подвигов зависит от вашего ранга сопротивления. Стоит заметить что вы не сможете потерять ранг сопротивления таким образом. А также до 5 ранга никакие штрафы не накладываются.

source: Critical engagements are special, limited encounters initiated by defeating certain adversaries in Save the Queen areas.
target: Критические сражения это особые, временные стычки появляющиеся при уничтожении машин в зонах «Спасения Королевы».

source: Once a critical engagement has been initiated, players must request deployment to participate.
target: Как только критическое сражение появилось, игроки могут отправить запрос на участие.

source: Only a limited number of players can participate in a critical engagement. The Resistance will recruit combatants for a limited time, after which players will be randomly selected from those who registered.
target: В критических сражениях могут участвовать ограниченное количество игроков. Набор игроков будет длится ограниченное время, после чего комбатанты будут выбраны случайным образом среди зарегистрированных игроков.

source:
It is possible to gain priority deployment for critical engagements. This can be accomplished in one of two ways:

■Quartermaster's Priority Deployment
Players may receive priority deployment in exchange for Bozjan clusters by speaking to the Resistance quartermaster at any nearby encampment.

■Combatant's Priority Deployment
Players who contribute to the initiation of a critical engagement may receive priority when registering for their next deployment. It should be noted that those with combatant's priority deployment are more likely to be chosen.

When registering as a party, all party members must have the same type of priority deployment for it to be recognized.
target:
Игроки могут получить приоритет на вступление в критические сражения. Раздобыть его можно двумя способами:

■Приоритет Квартирмейстера
Игроки могут получить приоритет в обмен на кристаллы Бозьи, поговорив с квартирмейстером в ближайшем лагере.

■Приоритет Комбатанта
Игроки участвовавшие в инициировании критического сражения получают приоритет на вступление в следующее сражение. У этих игроков будет самый высокий приоритет во время вступления.

Регистрируясь группой, все её участники должны иметь один тип приоритета.

source: When defeating warmachina, there is a chance players will come across Bozjan clusters.
target: Уничтожая боевые машины, есть шанс получить кристаллы Бозьи.

source:
These crystals can be traded to the Resistance quartermaster at any nearby encampment for various goods and services.

■Critical Engagement Priority Deployment
Bozjan clusters can be used to gain priority deployment for critical engagements.

■Item Exchange
Bozjan clusters can also be used to exchange for various items, including forgotten fragments.
target:
Эти кристаллы можно обменять у квартирмейстера сопротивления на товары и услуги в ближайшем лагере.

■Приоритет вступления в критические сражения
Кристаллы Бозьи можно потратить чтобы получить приоритет для критических сражений.

■Покупка товаров
Кристаллы Бозьи так же можно потратить в обмен на предметы и затерянные фрагменты.

source:
■Overview
Lost actions are special abilities that can only be used in Save the Queen areas. To acquire these actions, players must first find forgotten fragments, which drop occasionally when participating in skirmishes and critical engagements. These fragments can be examined by a Resistance appraiser, transforming them into lost actions.
There are a variety of lost actions to be found, some requiring a certain Resistance rank before they can be used. Any lost actions you have obtained will be automatically stored in the lost finds cache.

■Uses and Restrictions
There are six types of lost actions: offensive, defensive, restorative, beneficial, tactical, and detrimental. In certain cases, they may also be used as items rather than traditional actions.
It should be noted, however, that no one job can master them all, as each action has specific job requirements to use them.
target:
■Обзор
Затерянные действия это особые способности которые можно использовать только в зонах «Спасения Королевы». Чтобы получить их, игроки должны найти затерянные фрагменты, которые выпадают со стычек и критических сражений. Эти фрагменты может изучить оценщик сопротивления, превращая их в затерянные действия.
Есть множество действий которые можно найти. Но некоторые требуют определенного ранга сопротивления для использования. Все затерянные действия которые вы получаете будут отправлены в тайник затерянных находок.

■Пользование и ограничения
Есть шесть видов затерянных действий: атакующие, защитные, восстанавливающие, вспомогательные, тактические, ослабляющие. В определенных случаях их можно использовать как предметы.
У каждого действия есть требования к определенным профессиям. Поэтому чтобы использовать их, нужно соответсвовать требованиям.

source: Any lost actions not currently in use can be found in the lost finds cache. The cache can hold up to 200 of any given lost action. Those that exceed this limit will be lost.
target: Неиспользуемые затерянные действия можно найти в тайнике затерянных находок. Тайник может содержать до 200 единиц каждого действия. Излишки лимита не будут сохранятся.

source: To use lost actions in battle, they must first be moved from the lost finds cache to the lost finds holster. You must choose carefully, as the holster can only hold a limited number of actions. However, this limit can be increased with a higher Resistance rank.
target: Чтобы использовать действия их нужно вытащить из хранилища в кобуру. Но имейте ввиду что кобура может хранить ограниченное количество действий. Этот лимит можно увеличить повысив ранг Сопротивления.

source:
■Removing and Storing Lost Actions
Lost actions can be moved freely between the lost finds cache and lost finds holster. Be mindful, however, that the lost finds holster has a limited capacity for actions.

■Action Sets
Up to 10 combinations of your favorite lost actions can be saved as sets.
target:
■Извлечение и хранение затерянных действий
Затерянные действия можно перемещать из хранилища в кобуру. Однако имейте ввиду что кобура может хранить ограниченное количество действий.

■Наборы затерянных действий
До 10 комбинаций действий можно сохранить как наборы.

source: While assisting the Bozjan Resistance in their fight against the Empire, you will have the opportunity to create Bozjan gear. This gear possesses special attributes which are only effective when fighting in Save the Queen areas.
target: Помогая Сопротивлению Бозьи в борьбе с Империей, вы сможете создать снаряжение Бозьи. Это снаряжение обладает особыми свойствами, которые эффективны только в зонах «Спасение королевы».

source: Using Lost Actions
target: Применение затерянных действий

source:
Before lost actions can be used, they must first be converted into duty actions. Once converted, they will remain as duty actions even after leaving the instance, and will only expire after all uses have been depleted.

Lost actions from the item category, however, are unique in that they may be used directly from the lost finds holster. They may also be assigned to your hotbar, making them ideal for use in emergencies.
target:
Чтобы использовать затерянные действия их нужно сначала назначить как действия миссии. Как только они будут установлены, они останутся действиями миссии даже после выхода из зоны и пропадут только после использования всех зарядов.

Затерянные действия из категории предметов уникальны и могут быть использованы сразу из кобуры. Их так же можно назначить на панель на случай чрезвычайной ситуации.

source:
■Keyboard and Mouse
All duty actions and items can be used by left-clicking their icon, but can be bound to other keys.

■Gamepad
Duty actions are used by pressing <var 1E 12 /var> while holding down both <var 1E 0F /var> and <var 1E 10 /var>. Lost actions from the item category must be selected from the lost finds holster. They may also be assigned to your hotbar.
target:
■Клавиатура и мышь
Все предметы и действия миссии можно использовать нажав по их иконке левой кнопкой мыши, либо назначить их на другие кнопки.

■Контроллер
Действия миссии можно использовать нажав <var 1E 12 /var> удерживая одновременно <var 1E 0F /var> и <var 1E 10 /var>. Затерянные действия из категории предметов нужно выбирать из кобуры. Их так же можно назначить на панель.

source: Voyage Missions
target: Voyage Missions

source:
Upon boarding the <var 1A 02 /var>Endeavor<var 1A 01 /var>, players will receive three missions from the captain. Mission details will be displayed in a special UI window while the voyage is underway and will vary from route to route.

A mission requirement might be “Catch sharks,” or “Catch fish with a weak bite.” Bite strength can be determined by the number of exclamation marks displayed above a fisher's head when hooking a fish:

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>! = weak bite
!! = strong bite
!!! = ferocious bite<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

To complete a mission, a player must catch the required number of designated fish, with bonus points being added to a player's score at the end of the voyage based on the number of missions completed.

If you're aiming for the highest score possible, don't let these missions be the ones that got away!
target:

A mission requirement might be “Catch sharks,” or “Catch fish with a weak bite.” Bite strength can be determined by the number of exclamation marks displayed above a fisher's head when hooking a fish:

!! = strong bite

To complete a mission, a player must catch the required number of designated fish, with bonus points being added to a player's score at the end of the voyage based on the number of missions completed.

If you're aiming for the highest score possible, don't let these missions be the ones that got away!

source: Abandoning a Voyage
target: Abandoning a Voyage

source:
Players who abandon a voyage partway through will be unable to register to board again during the current voyage's registration period.
※Unlike the usual Duty Finder penalty, this restriction only applies to Ocean Fishing.
※Boarding registration restrictions apply across all Worlds.
target:
Players who abandon a voyage partway through will be unable to register to board again during the current voyage's registration period.
※Unlike the usual Duty Finder penalty, this restriction only applies to Ocean Fishing.
※Boarding registration restrictions apply across all Worlds.

source: Overview

source: Setting Match Rules
target: Setting Match Rules

source: An Open tournament is a Triple Triad competition in which eight participants battle it out under a prearranged set of rules.
target: An Open tournament is a Triple Triad competition in which eight participants battle it out under a prearranged set of rules.

source:
■The Basics
Designed for solo players, this tournament mode pits registered participants against each other in contests of up to eight opponents.

■How to Participate
Speak with the Open tournament official in the Gold Saucer to register for the next available competition. <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Registration periods last for 30 minutes and occur every two hours (Earth time).<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

The tournament will begin when 8 participants have been assembled or once the requisite amount of time has elapsed since the registration period began. If there are fewer than 8 participants available, NPCs will sit in for any missing players. Registration times may be viewed via the Open tournament schedule.

■Rewards
MGP, Triple Triad cards, and other prizes will be awarded at the end of a tournament, with final rankings and win rate determining the reward amount. Titles and items are also available as achievement rewards.

In the case that multiple players earn the same ranking, the MGP amount for the ranking reward will be adjusted accordingly.
target:
■The Basics
Designed for solo players, this tournament mode pits registered participants against each other in contests of up to eight opponents.

■How to Participate
Speak with the Open tournament official in the Gold Saucer to register for the next available competition. <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Registration periods last for 30 minutes and occur every two hours (Earth time).<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

The tournament will begin when 8 participants have been assembled or once the requisite amount of time has elapsed since the registration period began. If there are fewer than 8 participants available, NPCs will sit in for any missing players. Registration times may be viewed via the Open tournament schedule.

■Rewards
MGP, Triple Triad cards, and other prizes will be awarded at the end of a tournament, with final rankings and win rate determining the reward amount. Titles and items are also available as achievement rewards.

In the case that multiple players earn the same ranking, the MGP amount for the ranking reward will be adjusted accordingly.

source:
■Tournament Style
An Open tournament consists of three matches, with participants earning points based on the outcome of each game: 2 points for a win, 1 point for a draw, and zero points for a loss. At the culmination of the third match, the participant with the most points is declared the victor.

In addition to victory points, the final number of captured cards is also recorded for each match. In the case that participants end the tournament with equal points, the player who most dominated the card grid over the course of the competition is awarded a higher ranking.

■Matching Opponents
For the first match, opponents are decided by pairing off the 8 participants at random. For the second and third matches, players are pit against whomever shares the closest point total at that stage in the tournament.
target:
■Tournament Style
An Open tournament consists of three matches, with participants earning points based on the outcome of each game: 2 points for a win, 1 point for a draw, and zero points for a loss. At the culmination of the third match, the participant with the most points is declared the victor.

In addition to victory points, the final number of captured cards is also recorded for each match. In the case that participants end the tournament with equal points, the player who most dominated the card grid over the course of the competition is awarded a higher ranking.

■Matching Opponents
For the first match, opponents are decided by pairing off the 8 participants at random. For the second and third matches, players are pit against whomever shares the closest point total at that stage in the tournament.

source:
■Match Rules
Regardless of any other ruleset in play, every Open tournament enforces the Draft rule. This rule guarantees a more balanced playing field by restricting participants to the use of temporary “house” cards.
target:
■Match Rules
Regardless of any other ruleset in play, every Open tournament enforces the Draft rule. This rule guarantees a more balanced playing field by restricting participants to the use of temporary “house” cards.

source: At the beginning of the competition, three sets of randomly generated cards will be displayed. Participants must choose one option from each set to build their deck, which will then be locked in for the rest of the tournament.
target: At the beginning of the competition, three sets of randomly generated cards will be displayed. Participants must choose one option from each set to build their deck, which will then be locked in for the rest of the tournament.

source:
Players who lack confidence in their deck-building abilities are encouraged to make use of the <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Recommended<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> button. This handy feature will automatically choose the strongest cards available.

Please note that while card options are randomized for each player, the number of rare cards on offer will always be the same.

■Rulesets
Speak with the tournament official and view the schedule to see which rules will be in effect for the upcoming competitions. Each tournament will be marked as having either a “basic” or “advanced” ruleset.

With the exception of Draft, basic tournaments have no advanced rules in play. All that is required to enjoy these matches is an understanding of the standard Triple Triad rules.

Advanced tournaments are for players who prefer their card battles with an extra layer of complexity. In addition to Draft, these contests will also feature advanced rules such as Same or Plus.

The Open tournament schedule will switch back and forth between basic and advanced rulesets, so you won't need to wait long before your preferred style of competition rolls around!
target:
Players who lack confidence in their deck-building abilities are encouraged to make use of the <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Recommended<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> button. This handy feature will automatically choose the strongest cards available.

Please note that while card options are randomized for each player, the number of rare cards on offer will always be the same.

■Rulesets
Speak with the tournament official and view the schedule to see which rules will be in effect for the upcoming competitions. Each tournament will be marked as having either a “basic” or “advanced” ruleset.

With the exception of Draft, basic tournaments have no advanced rules in play. All that is required to enjoy these matches is an understanding of the standard Triple Triad rules.

Advanced tournaments are for players who prefer their card battles with an extra layer of complexity. In addition to Draft, these contests will also feature advanced rules such as Same or Plus.

The Open tournament schedule will switch back and forth between basic and advanced rulesets, so you won't need to wait long before your preferred style of competition rolls around!

source:
An Invitational tournament is a Triple Triad competition which follows the same basic structure as an Open tournament, with the main difference being that there are no rewards on offer. Participants may also register at any time as either a solo player or as a party.

■How to Participate
Players seeking the thrill of tournament play can form a party and register to enter the Triple Triad Invitational Parlor via the Duty Finder. In the case that a player registers solo, or a party has less than 8 members, the missing numbers will be made up by Triple Triad regulars or Gold Saucer employees.

■Rematches
At the end of an Invitational tournament, you will have the opportunity to organize a rematch. If every player agrees to the rematch, you can begin a new tournament with the current participants without needing to leave or re-register the party. Up to three rematches are available per tournament registration.
target:

For the sake of a harmonious experience, it is strongly suggested that players agree upon a ruleset before commencing registration!

source:
Dear <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>,

I hope this message finds you. I'm going on a journey─to learn the secrets of the white spheres for myself. Maybe some of them will be of use to you...

I'll keep a record, just in case.

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　- Konogg
target:
<var 08 E905 ((Дорогая)) ((Дорогой)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>,

Надеюсь, это сообщение достигнет вас. Я отправляюсь в путешествие, чтобы самому узнать секреты белых сфер. Возможно, некоторые из них вам пригодятся...

На всякий случай, я буду вести записи.

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　- Konogg

source:
Dear <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>,

I forgot to mention─I brought a pod with me. It assures me that the spheres came from a different world, and their purpose is to invade others by duplicating the machine lifeforms.

It's weird to think that to someone, ours is the “other” world.

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　- Konogg
target:
<var 08 E905 ((Дорогая)) ((Дорогой)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>,

Я забыл упомянуть — Pod со мной. Он уверяет меня, что сферы прибыли сюда из другого мира и что их цель — вторжение в другие миры посредством дублирования машинных форм жизни.

Странна мысль того, что для кого-то наш мир — «другой».

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　- Konogg

source:
Dear <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>,

I found out that 2B and 9S accessed the spheres before this all started, which is why they knew about the machine lifeforms' plans to take over our world. They added their own data to that of the machine lifeforms when copies were being made─like some sort of technological virus, apparently─so that they could come here and stop the machines.

They were our allies, from beginning to end...

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　- Konogg
target:
<var 08 E905 ((Дорогая)) ((Дорогой)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>,

Я выяснил, что 2B и 9S получили доступ к сферам до того, как всё это началось, поэтому они знали о планах машинных форм жизни захватить наш мир. Они добавили свои собственные данные к данным машинных форм жизни, когда создавались их копии. Своего рода технологический вирус, очевидно, — чтобы они смогли прийти сюда и остановить машины.

Они были нашими союзниками с начала и до самого конца...

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　- Konogg

source:
Dear <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>,

The white spheres have ties to 2B and 9S's world, which is almost inconceivably advanced. I've found that data there is stored by machines bearing the names of gods, and even the tiniest glimpse of the smallest portion of it reveals memories by the hundreds─<var 1A 02 /var>people's<var 1A 01 /var> memories.

What does it <var 1A 02 /var>mean<var 1A 01 /var>? I need to know.

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　- Konogg
target:
<var 08 E905 ((Дорогая)) ((Дорогой)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>,

Белые сферы связаны с миром 2B и 9S, который почти немыслимо развит. Я обнаружил, что данные там хранятся в машинах, носящих имена богов, и даже самый крошечный взгляд на малейшую их часть открывает сотни <var 1A 02 /var>людских<var 1A 01 /var> воспоминаний.

Что это <var 1A 02 /var>значит<var 1A 01 /var>? Мне нужно узнать.

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　- Konogg

source:
Dear <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>,

I knew all along, really.

I knew that Anogg was dead, and that <var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var> with me only looked like her. But being with her, whatever she was... It kept me alive. It made me want to go on living.

If the spheres can create anything─rebuild it in our world─then surely they can grant me this.

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　- Konogg
target:
<var 08 E905 ((Дорогая)) ((Дорогой)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>,

Я знал всё это время, правда.

Я знал, что Anogg мертва, а та <var 1A 02 /var>штука<var 1A 01 /var> со мной, она только похожа на неё. Но бытие с ней, кем бы она ни была... придавало мне сил, чтобы жить. Это заставляло меня хотеть жить дальше.

Если сферы могут создать что-либо — воссоздать это в нашем мире — то, конечно, они могут дать мне это.

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　- Konogg

source:
For as long as I can remember, it's been just the two of us. Hardly anyone even bothered to be kind to us. But we always had each other. When I was with Anogg, there was nothing to fear.

What my sister wanted most was to get revenge on the world that had done this to us. I can't accept that the world got her first.

I won't.
target:
Сколько себя помню, мы всегда были только вдвоём. Почти никто не утруждался проявить к нам доброту. Однако, мы всегда были друг у друга. Когда я был с Anogg, бояться было нечего.

Больше всего моя сестра хотела отомстить миру, который так с нами поступил. Я не могу смириться с тем, что мир забрал её первой.

Я не смогу.

source: Delubrum Reginae is a 24-player duty wherein adventurers explore the underground ruins of Bozja.
target: Делюбрум Регине это миссия на 24 игроков в которой искатели приключений исследуют подземные руины Бозьи.

source:
■Basics
This duty can be joined solo, as a party, or as an alliance, and players are free to change areas after registering. It should be noted, however, that alliances will be temporarily disbanded upon entering. Moreover, party composition may change once inside the duty.

Although this duty is in a separate instance, lost actions can still be used once inside. Be sure to prepare lost actions from the lost finds cache, as they may prove key to turning the tide of battle.
target:
■Основы
В эту миссию можно войти одному, группой или альянсом. Игроки вольны менять зоны после регистрации. Следует отметить что альянсы будут временно расформированы после вступления. К тому же состав групп можно изменить внутри миссии.

Хоть эта миссия и находится в другой зоне, но затерянные действия можно использовать сразу после вступления. Удостоверьтесь что подготовили затерянные действия из тайника затерянных находок, так как они могут обернуть исход сражения.

source:
■Requirements
A Disciple of War or Magic level 80 or higher is required to enter.
target:
■Требования
Необходим Адепт Битвы или Магии 80 уровня или выше чтобы войти.

source:
■Restrictions
Players cannot change jobs after entering this duty.

All equipment will be adjusted to item level 430. Furthermore, materia bonuses will be ignored, regardless of the item level of gear affixed with materia.
target:
■Ограничения
Игроки не могут менять профессии после вступления в эту миссию.

Уровень снаряжения будет выравнен до 430 уровня. А так же бонусы материй будут игнорированы, независимо от уровня снаряжения.

source: Any lost actions obtained on the Bozjan southern front, or previously set as duty actions will carry over into this duty. A lost finds cache and Resistance appraiser are also available at the start of the instance.
target: Все затерянные действия полученные в южном фронте Бозьи, а так же и те что установлены как действия миссии, будут перенесены в эту миссию. Тайник и оценщик сопротивления будут доступны на старте зоны.

source:
Players may encounter traps while fighting their way through Delubrum Reginae. Traps are invisible and, when triggered, can deal large amounts of damage or afflict players with any number of debilitating effects.

That said, there are certain lost actions that will allow one to detect traps before they are activated.
target:
Игроки могут встретить ловушки на своем пути через Делюбрум Регине. Ловушки невидимы и при активации могут нанести огромный урон или наложить на игроков различные изнуряющие эффекты.

Тем не менее, есть определенные затерянные действия позволяющие обнаружить ловушки до их активации.

source: Players incapacitated in Delubrum Reginae will lose a portion of the mettle required to reach their next rank. After being incapacitated, an additional penalty to mettle will be incurred should players use Return to retreat from the battlefield to the start of the instance. Players who leave the instance while incapacitated will also receive the aforementioned penalties.
target: Поверженные в Делюрум Регине игроки теряют очки подвигов. При использовании «Возврата» чтобы вернуться в начало зоны игроки получат еще один штраф на очки подвигов. Если выйти из зоны будучи поверженным, то игрок в добавок получит дополнительный штраф.

source: The additional effects of Bozjan gear will also be applied in Delubrum Reginae. Moreover, by completing this duty, players will obtain items that can be exchanged for more powerful gear.
target: Дополнительный эффект снаряжения Бозьи доступен и в Делюбрум Регине. К тому же, пройдя эту миссию, игроки получат предметы для обмена на более сильное снаряжение.

source: Alliances will be temporarily disbanded upon entering Delubrum Reginae. Party compositions may also change once inside.
target: Альянсы будут временно расформированы во время входа в Делюбрум Регине. Состав команд так же может измениться внутри.

source: Treasure coffers that appear in this instance yield separate rewards for each player. Be certain to open any you find as you fight your way through the ruins.
target: Сундуки сокровищ которые появляются в этой зоне имеют индивидуальные награды для каждого игрока. Убедитесь что открыли их пока пробираетесь с боем через руины.

source: Delubrum Reginae (Savage) is a duty for 24 to 48 players wherein adventurers explore the underground ruins of Bozja.
target: Делюбрум Регине (Кошмарный) это миссия для 24 - 48 игроков в которой искатели приключений исследуют подземные руины Бозьи.

source:
■Basics
An alliance of 24 to 48 players is required to register for this duty. The Party Finder may be used to recruit members for this duty by selecting the Field Operations category, then Delubrum Reginae (Savage). After forming an alliance, the alliance leader must speak with the troubled gentleman in Gangos to register.

While inside Delubrum Reginae (Savage), players will be subjected to a status effect that prevents resurrection by certain means, making due preparation all the more essential for this encounter.
target:
■Основы
Для этой миссии необходим альянс из 24 - 48 игроков. Для подбора игроков следует использовать «Поиск группы» выбрав категорию «Приключенческие вылазки», а затем выбрав Делюбрум Регине (Кошмарный). После сбора альянса лидер должен будет поговорить с Troubled gentleman в Гангос для регистрации.

Находясь внутри Делюбрум регине (Кошмарный), игроки будут подвержены статус эффекту который предотвращает воскрешение определенными способами, что существенно повышает важность подготовки.

source:
■Requirements
A Disciple of War or Magic level 80 or higher is required to enter.
target:
■Требования
Необходим Адепт Битвы или Магии 80 уровня или выше чтобы войти.

source:
■Restrictions
Players cannot change jobs after entering this duty.

All equipment will be adjusted to item level 430. Furthermore, materia bonuses will be ignored, regardless of the item level of gear affixed with materia.
target:
■Ограничения
Игроки не могут менять профессии после вступления в эту миссию.

Уровень снаряжения будет выравнен до 430 уровня. А так же бонусы материй будут игнорированы, независимо от уровня снаряжения.

source: Any lost actions obtained on the Bozjan southern front, or previously set as duty actions will carry over into this duty. A lost finds cache and Resistance appraiser are also available at the start of the instance.
target: Все затерянные действия полученные в южном фронте Бозьи, а так же и те что установлены как действия миссии, будут перенесены в эту миссию. Тайник и оценщик сопротивления будут доступны на старте зоны.

source:
Players may encounter traps while fighting their way through Delubrum Reginae (Savage). Traps are invisible and, when triggered, can deal large amounts of damage or afflict players with any number of debilitating effects.

That said, there are certain lost actions that will allow one to detect traps before they are activated.
target:
Игроки могут встретить ловушки на своем пути через Делюбрум Регине (Кошмарный). Ловушки невидимы и при активации могут нанести огромный урон или наложить на игроков различные изнуряющие эффекты.

Тем не менее, есть определенные затерянные действия позволяющие обнаружить ловушки до их активации.

source: The additional effects of Bozjan gear will also be applied in Delubrum Reginae (Savage). Moreover, by completing this duty, players will obtain items that can be exchanged for more powerful gear.
target: Дополнительный эффект снаряжения Бозьи доступен и в Делюбрум Регине (Кошмарный). К тому же, пройдя эту миссию, игроки получат предметы для обмена на более сильное снаряжение.

source: After being incapacitated, if you are not revived within a certain period of time, you will be forcibly removed from the duty. Moreover, the option to return to the start of the instance when incapacitated has been replaced with an option to abandon the duty.
target: Если после падения игрока не воскресили за определенное время, то его автоматически исключит из миссии. К тому же когда игрок повержен, возврат на старт зоны заменяется на Покидание зоны.

source: Players incapacitated in Delubrum Reginae (Savage) will lose a portion of the mettle required to reach their next rank. After being incapacitated, an additional penalty to mettle will be incurred should players leave the instance before being revived.
target: Поверженные игроки в Делюбрум Регине (Кошмарный) теряют очки подвигов. Игрок попытавшийся выйти из зоны после падения получит дополнительный штраф.

source: Alliances will be temporarily disbanded upon entering Delubrum Reginae (Savage). Party compositions may also change once inside.
target: Альянсы будут временно расформированы во время входа в Делюбрум Регине (Кошмарный). Состав команд так же может измениться внутри.

source: Treasure coffers that appear in this instance yield separate rewards for each player. Be certain to open any you find as you fight your way through the ruins.
target: Сундуки сокровищ которые появляются в этой зоне имеют индивидуальные награды для каждого игрока. Убедитесь что открыли их пока пробираетесь с боем через руины.

source: While inside Delubrum Reginae (Savage), players will be subjected to a status effect that prevents resurrection by certain means. Raise effects granted via limit breaks and certain lost actions are exempt from this restriction.
target: Находясь внутри Делюбрум регине (Кошмарный), игроки будут подвержены статус эффекту который предотвращает воскрешение определенными способами. Эффекты воскрешения от Запредельной способности и определенных затерянных действий являются исключением из этого ограничения.

source: Konogg's Messages
target: Сообщение Konogg'а

source:
■Types of Discarded Tile
Discarded tiles are highlighted to indicate whether they were discarded immediately after being drawn or if they were called by another player.
target:
■Виды сброшенных костей
Сброшенные кости подсвечиваются, либо когда они были сброшены сразу после добора, либо если эту кость забрал другой игрок.

source:
1. Dark highlight = A tile discarded immediately after being drawn.
2. Red = A discarded tile called by another player.
3. Dark and red = A tile discarded immediately after being drawn, then called by another player.
target:
1. Тёмная подсветка = Кость была сброшена после добора.
2. Красная = Кость забрал другой игрок.
3. Тёмно-красная = Кость была сброшена после добора, а затем её забрал другой игрок.

source:
■Dora Indicator Settings
There are two settings for the dora indicator:

Doman Mahjong: The dora indicator is the same as the tile that applies the dora bonus.
Traditional: The dora indicator is the tile below that which applies the dora bonus.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>This setting can be toggled in the settings for Doman Mahjong, under Gold Saucer in the Character menu.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target:
■Настройки индикатора доры
Существуют две настройки индикатора доры:

Доманский маджонг: Бонус дора даётся от той кости, на которую указывает индикатор доры.
Традиционный: Бонус дора даётся от кости, которая ниже той, на которую указывает индикатор доры.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Эту настройку можно изменить в настройках доманского маджонга, расположенные в меню «Золотого Блюдца».<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: Resistance Honors
target: Медали Сопротивления

source: Overview
target: Обзор

source: Resistance Honors
target: Медали Сопротивления

source: Proofs of Mettle
target: Очки подвигов

source:
Resistance honors are awards granted to those who have demonstrated exemplary heroism and courage on the battlefield. 

To receive Resistance honors, you must first amass sufficient mettle and speak with the Resistance councilor to receive proofs of mettle. These may then be exchanged for honors of your choosing.

Once in your possession, Resistance honors will grant enhanced attributes while undertaking duties in Save the Queen areas.
target:
Ордена сопротивления это награда для тех кто продемонстрировал образцовый героизм и храбрость на поле боя.

Чтобы получить орден сопротивления, вы должны накопить достаточно очков подвигов, а затем поговорить с Командиром Сопротивления чтобы получить очки аттестации. Затем их можно обменять на медали на ваш выбор.

Как только вы их получите, медали сопротивления будут давать вам атрибуты в зонах «Спасения Королевы».

source:
There are three types of Resistance honors, and you can hold up to ten of each. The more of these honors in your possession, the greater their effect.

It should be noted, however, that the required number of proofs of mettle increases as you earn more Resistance honors. Their effects are as follows:

■Sun of Fortitude
Increases maximum HP.

■Sun of Valor
Increases damage dealt.

■Sun of Succor
Increases healing potency.
target:
Есть несколько видов медалей и каждую можно собрать до 10. Чем больше их количество, тем лучше их эффект.

Однако следует заметить что требуемое количество очков аттестации для каждой последующей медали увеличивается. Их эффекты следующие:

■Медаль Стойкости
Увеличивает максимальное ОЗ.

■Медаль Храбрости
Увеличивает наносимый урон.

■Медаль Благодетеля
Увеличивает силу лечения.

source:
Proofs of mettle can be received from the Resistance councilor in exchange for mettle.

After receiving a sufficient number of proofs, they may then be exchanged for Resistance honors.

Proofs of mettle do not occupy inventory space, and the number in your possession can be confirmed at any time via the HUD.
target:
Очки аттестации можно получить у советника Сопротивления в обмен на очки подвигов.

После получения очков аттестации, их можно обменять на ордена Сопротивления.

Очки аттестации не занимают место в инвентаре. Их количество можно посмотреть через интерфейс.

source: Solo Engagements
target: Одиночные стычки

source:
Players who exhibit exemplary performance during certain critical engagements may be challenged to a duel by enemy combatants.
In the event more than one player has accepted an invitation to duel, one will be selected from among them at random.

Should you be chosen, make certain you are duly prepared and keep lost actions at the ready─these engagements are not for the faint of heart.
target:
Игроки показавшие выдающиеся результаты во время определенных критических сражений, могут быть вызваны на дуэль вражеским лидером.
В случае если приглашение на дуэль получило несколько игроков, то случайным образом среди них будет выбран один.

Перед тем как вступить в бой, тщательно подготовьтесь. Ведь эти сражения станут настоящим испытанием.

source: Notoriety
target: Дурная слава

source:
In the event you are not chosen to duel, your participation in the prerequisite critical engagement will earn you notoriety. As your notoriety increases, so too will your chances of being chosen to duel.

It should be noted, however, that all notoriety is lost when you are selected.
target:
Если вам не повезло во время выбора, то результат в критическом сражении принесет вам дурную славу. Чем больше ваша дурная слава, тем больше шанс стать целью для дуэли.

Однако после того как вас выберут для дуэли, вся ваша дурная слава пропадет.

source: Large-scale Assaults
target: Массовые нападения

source:
Large-scale assaults are duties in Save the Queen areas wherein up to 48 players enter imperial strongholds.

These duties become available when a certain number of eligible players are in the area, and a sufficient amount of time has passed.

Coordination and teamwork are key to overcome the various pitfalls and powerful enemies that await within.
target:
Массовые нападения это особые миссии в зонах "Спасения Королевы", в которых до 48 игроков должны будут штурмовать имперскую крепость.

Эти миссии становятся доступными когда в зоне находится достаточное количество игроков и при этом прошло достаточно времени.

Командная работа является ключевым моментом для преодоления препятствий внутри.

source: Wildlife Encounters at Sea
target: Wildlife Encounters at Sea

source:
While sailing the seas on the <var 1A 02 /var>Endeavor<var 1A 01 /var>, you will occasionally come across dolphins and seagulls. Sailors, notorious for their superstitious beliefs, consider such encounters to be omens of good fortune─the appearance of a lively pod or raucous flock is said to be a boon for fishing, and even influence the likelihood of a spectral current.

Be sure to pay close attention when your voyage is favored by these unexpected visitors!
target:
While sailing the seas on the <var 1A 02 /var>Endeavor<var 1A 01 /var>, you will occasionally come across dolphins and seagulls. Sailors, notorious for their superstitious beliefs, consider such encounters to be omens of good fortune─the appearance of a lively pod or raucous flock is said to be a boon for fishing, and even influence the likelihood of a spectral current.

Be sure to pay close attention when your voyage is favored by these unexpected visitors!

source: Initiating Large-scale Assaults
target: Инициирование массовых нападений

source: When seeking to initiate large-scale assaults, it should be noted that the completion of critical engagements and skirmishes will reduce the time remaining before a large-scale assault may be triggered.
target: Завершение критических сражений и стычек уменьшают оставшееся время перед появлением следующего массового нападения.

source: Zadnor
target: Заднор

source: At Zadnor, players can participate in large-scale encounters to help the Bozjan Resistance reclaim their homeland from the IVth Imperial Legion.
target: В Задноре игроки принимают участие в массовых сражениях, чтобы помочь Сопротивлению Бозьи освободить их родину от IV-го Имперского Легиона.

source: Portraits
target: Portraits

source: Portrait Basics
target: Portrait Basics

source:
The portrait feature allows you to use a variety of poses, motions, and framing options to compose the perfect portrait of your character.

■Portrait Usage
Images created with this feature can be used as “instant portraits,” which will display at the beginning of certain duties.

■Number of Portraits
One portrait may be created per gear set for any class/job.
target:
The portrait feature allows you to use a variety of poses, motions, and framing options to compose the perfect portrait of your character.

■Portrait Usage
Images created with this feature can be used as “instant portraits,” which will display at the beginning of certain duties.

■Number of Portraits
One portrait may be created per gear set for any class/job.

source: Applicable Content
target: Applicable Content

source:
Instant portraits are displayed at a variety of times, including:
・When dungeons, raids, and trials commence
・While awarding player commendations
・At the start of a Crystalline Conflict (PvP) match
・At the start of a Doman mahjong match

Use the various customization options to create a portrait that best represents you!
target:
Instant portraits are displayed at a variety of times, including:
・When dungeons, raids, and trials commence
・While awarding player commendations
・At the start of a Crystalline Conflict (PvP) match
・At the start of a Doman mahjong match

Use the various customization options to create a portrait that best represents you!

source: Instant Portraits
target: Instant Portraits

source:
Instant portraits are used to introduce participants at the beginning of duties and competitive content such as Crystalline Conflict and Doman mahjong.

■Applying Instant Portraits
Generally, when a gear set is equipped, the portrait linked to it will be automatically applied as your instant portrait.
※You must change your equipment via the gear set to apply its corresponding portrait.

■Display Requirements
In order for an instant portrait to be successfully displayed, its corresponding gear set must be marked with an “E” for “Equipped” in the portrait editor, and the portrait in question must match both the current gear and appearance of your character. If the gear/appearance of your character is different from that of your instant portrait, the portrait used to introduce your character will revert to a default image.
target:

If the gear/appearance of your character is different from that of your instant portrait, the portrait used to introduce your character will revert to a default image.

source: Editing Portraits
target: Editing Portraits

source: Getting Started
target: Getting Started

source:
The Portrait interface displays all current gear sets, the portraits of which may be edited via the subcommand or by selecting “Edit” above the portrait image.

■If a Portrait Cannot Be Edited
In cases of data inconsistencies resulting from incompatible settings, a portrait may become unable to be edited. Select the “Restore Default Settings” subcommand to reset your portrait and edit it as usual.
target:
The Portrait interface displays all current gear sets, the portraits of which may be edited via the subcommand or by selecting “Edit” above the portrait image.

■If a Portrait Cannot Be Edited
In cases of data inconsistencies resulting from incompatible settings, a portrait may become unable to be edited. Select the “Restore Default Settings” subcommand to reset your portrait and edit it as usual.

source: Portrait Composition
target: Portrait Composition

source:
Each element of a portrait can be adjusted. Adjustable settings are as follows:

■Design
Background/Frame/Accent

■Character
Pose/Expression/Facial Direction/Gaze Direction

■Lighting
Ambient/Directional

■Camera
・Tilt (Tumble)
・Distance (Dolly)
・Positioning (Track)
・Rotation (Roll)
・Lens (Zoom)
target:
Each element of a portrait can be adjusted. Adjustable settings are as follows:

■Design
Background/Frame/Accent

■Character
Pose/Expression/Facial Direction/Gaze Direction

■Lighting
Ambient/Directional

■Camera
・Tilt (Tumble)
・Distance (Dolly)
・Positioning (Track)
・Rotation (Roll)
・Lens (Zoom)

source: Design Settings
target: Design Settings

source:
The following design settings can be adjusted:
1. Background
2. Frame
3. Accent

Background designs will appear behind the portrait subject, whereas frames and accents will be layered on top.
target:
The following design settings can be adjusted:
1. Background
2. Frame
3. Accent

Background designs will appear behind the portrait subject, whereas frames and accents will be layered on top.

source: Character Settings
target: Character Settings

source:
The following character settings can be adjusted:
1. Pose
2. Expression
3. Facial and Gaze Direction

■Pose
Select from a variety of emotes and actions, and choose whether to pause or play motions to create your desired pose.

■Expression
Adjust your facial expression independently from chosen pose.

■Facial and Gaze Direction
Choose whether your face and gaze are directed toward the camera or elsewhere.
※These settings are unavailable when using certain poses, such as actions and some emotes.
target:
The following character settings can be adjusted:
1. Pose
2. Expression
3. Facial and Gaze Direction

■Pose
Select from a variety of emotes and actions, and choose whether to pause or play motions to create your desired pose.

■Expression
Adjust your facial expression independently from chosen pose.

■Facial and Gaze Direction
Choose whether your face and gaze are directed toward the camera or elsewhere.
※These settings are unavailable when using certain poses, such as actions and some emotes.

source: Lighting Settings
target: Lighting Settings

source:
The following lighting settings can be adjusted:
1. Ambient Lighting
2. Directional Lighting

■Ambient Lighting
Settings in this category affect the brightness and color values of the portrait as a whole.

■Directional Lighting
Settings in this category affect the positioning, brightness, and color values of the directional light source.
target:
The following lighting settings can be adjusted:
1. Ambient Lighting
2. Directional Lighting

■Ambient Lighting
Settings in this category affect the brightness and color values of the portrait as a whole.

■Directional Lighting
Settings in this category affect the positioning, brightness, and color values of the directional light source.

source: Camera Settings
target: Camera Settings

source:
The following settings concerning the camera's placement and focal point can be adjusted:
・Tilt (Tumble)
・Distance (Dolly)
・Positioning (Track)
・Rotation (Roll)
・Lens (Zoom)

■Tilt (Tumble)
This setting affects the camera angle with respect to the focal point (your character). It can be adjusted using the right stick on a <var 08 E4E94C01 ((gamepad)) ((controller)) /var> or by left-clicking and dragging the mouse.
※Use of the positioning (track) settings may change the portrait's focal point.

■Distance (Dolly)
Camera distance functions similarly to the zoom function in the overworld. It can be adjusted by pressing <var 1E 0D /var> and tilting the right stick on a <var 08 E4E94C01 ((gamepad)) ((controller)) /var>, or by scrolling with the mouse wheel while the cursor is over your portrait.

■Positioning (Track)
Positioning moves the focal point both horizontally and vertically, and can be adjusted via the left stick on a <var 08 E4E94C01 ((gamepad)) ((controller)) /var>, or by right-clicking and dragging the mouse while the cursor is over your portrait.

■Rotation (Roll)
This slider, found below the portrait currently being edited, rotates the camera itself to adjust the direction of its focus.

■Lens (Zoom)
As opposed to the camera itself, this setting affects the camera lens's zoom to make the field of view wider or narrower. Its slider is also found below the portrait.

source: Saving Portraits
target: Saving Portraits

source:
You may save your completed portrait using the button at the bottom of the portrait editor window assuming that the following conditions are met:
1. Your character is visible in the portrait.
2. Their expression is visible in the portrait.

■Character Visibility
Certain camera or focal point placements may leave your character out of the frame. Adjust these settings so that your character can be seen.

■Expression Visibility
Certain camera or focal point placements may leave your character's expression out of the frame. Adjust these settings so that the expression can be seen.
target:

source: 17. First Come, First Served
target: 17. First Come, First Served

source:
■First-come-first-served Land Purchases
In a first-come-first-served housing area, you may immediately purchase an unowned plot by accessing the placard located at its entrance and selecting “Purchase Land.”
The requirements for purchasing land vary depending on whether you are a private buyer or a representative of your free company.

　・Purchasing as a Private Buyer
　　1. You must have at least one class at level 50.
　　2. You must hold a rank of second lieutenant or above in one of the Grand Companies.

　・Purchasing as a Free Company Representative
　　1. Your free company must be authorized to acquire land.
　　2. Your free company must have four or more members.
　　3. You must be authorized by your free company to purchase and relinquish land.
　　4. You must have been a member of your free company for 30 days or longer.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>To purchase land in Empyreum, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Litany of Peace,” whether you are a private buyer or free company representative.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>To purchase land in Shirogane, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Not without Incident,” whether you are a private buyer or free company representative.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: Adventurer Plate
target: Adventurer Plate

source: Choosing a Primary Portrait
target: Choosing a Primary Portrait

source:
In order to apply a portrait to your adventurer plate, you must set it as your primary portrait.

■Setting a Primary Portrait
1. Select the title of the portrait you wish to use from your Portraits gallery.
2. Access the subcommand menu, and choose “Apply to Adventurer Plate.”
3. Select “Yes” in the confirmation window that appears.
target:
In order to apply a portrait to your adventurer plate, you must set it as your primary portrait.

■Setting a Primary Portrait
1. Select the title of the portrait you wish to use from your Portraits gallery.
2. Access the subcommand menu, and choose “Apply to Adventurer Plate.”
3. Select “Yes” in the confirmation window that appears.

source: Gear Set Links
target: Gear Set Links

source: Link via Portraits Gallery
target: Link via Portraits Gallery

source:
To choose a specific portrait to be shown when Crystalline Conflict PvP matches commence, you must set that portrait as an instant portrait.

■Setting an Instant Portrait
1. Select the title of the portrait you wish to use from your Portraits gallery.
2. Access the subcommand menu, and choose “Use as Instant Portrait.”
3. Select “Yes” in the confirmation window that appears.

■Linking to Gear Sets
If you link a portrait with a particular gear set, it will be automatically set as your instant portrait whenever you equip that gear set.
1. Select the title of the portrait you wish to use from your Portraits gallery.
2. Access the subcommand menu, and choose “Link with Gear Set.”
3. Choose a gear set to link in the window that appears, then confirm your selection.
The appropriate portrait will now appear whenever you change to the gear set you selected!

■Restrictions
The instant portrait displayed in advance of a Crystalline Conflict match must show you in the gear that you are wearing at the time of match commencement. Should you update a previously linked gear set, please ensure that you also update your instant portrait.
※If your previously selected instant portrait cannot be displayed in Crystalline Conflict, a default instant portrait will appear instead.
target:
To choose a specific portrait to be shown when Crystalline Conflict PvP matches commence, you must set that portrait as an instant portrait.

■Setting an Instant Portrait
1. Select the title of the portrait you wish to use from your Portraits gallery.
2. Access the subcommand menu, and choose “Use as Instant Portrait.”
3. Select “Yes” in the confirmation window that appears.

■Linking to Gear Sets
If you link a portrait with a particular gear set, it will be automatically set as your instant portrait whenever you equip that gear set.
1. Select the title of the portrait you wish to use from your Portraits gallery.
2. Access the subcommand menu, and choose “Link with Gear Set.”
3. Choose a gear set to link in the window that appears, then confirm your selection.
The appropriate portrait will now appear whenever you change to the gear set you selected!

■Restrictions
The instant portrait displayed in advance of a Crystalline Conflict match must show you in the gear that you are wearing at the time of match commencement. Should you update a previously linked gear set, please ensure that you also update your instant portrait.
※If your previously selected instant portrait cannot be displayed in Crystalline Conflict, a default instant portrait will appear instead.

source: Link via Gear Set List
target: Link via Gear Set List

source:
Outside of your Portraits gallery, instant portraits can also be linked to gear sets via the Gear Set List.

■Linking to Portraits
1. Select the name of the gear set you wish to use from your Gear Set List.
2. Access the subcommand menu, and choose “Link Portrait.”
3. Choose a portrait to link in the window that appears, then confirm your selection.
target:
Outside of your Portraits gallery, instant portraits can also be linked to gear sets via the Gear Set List.

■Linking to Portraits
1. Select the name of the gear set you wish to use from your Gear Set List.
2. Access the subcommand menu, and choose “Link Portrait.”
3. Choose a portrait to link in the window that appears, then confirm your selection.

source: Precautions
target: Precautions

source: Using Fantasia
target: Using Fantasia

source:
The transformative nature of Fantasia results in the alteration of your character's appearance, from subtle adjustments to a complete change in race or gender. As such, instant portraits created before using Fantasia will not be applicable, as they will no longer match your character's current appearance.

In order to use your portraits again, you must edit them individually so that they match your character's current appearance.
target:
The transformative nature of Fantasia results in the alteration of your character's appearance, from subtle adjustments to a complete change in race or gender. As such, instant portraits created before using Fantasia will not be applicable, as they will no longer match your character's current appearance.

In order to use your portraits again, you must edit them individually so that they match your character's current appearance.

source: Portrait Elements
target: Portrait Elements

source: Additions to your stock of portrait elements (complex motions, accent pieces, etc.) can be acquired through completing quests, challenging duties, and other in-game means. Collect them to unlock even greater freedom of expression!
target: Additions to your stock of portrait elements (complex motions, accent pieces, etc.) can be acquired through completing quests, challenging duties, and other in-game means. Collect them to unlock even greater freedom of expression!

source: 18. Housing Lottery
target: 18. Housing Lottery

source:
■Lottery Land Purchases
In a lottery housing area, you may enter the lottery for a plot of land by accessing the placard located at its entrance and selecting “Enter Lottery.”

■Lottery Schedule
A lottery's entry period will last for five days (Earth time), after which the lottery results will be announced. This results period will last for four days (Earth time). The lottery will be repeated in this way until all eligible plots of land are won and claimed.

■Entry Requirements
Characters that fulfill the requirements listed below are eligible to submit one lottery entry per lottery period. Once submitted, a lottery entry may not be withdrawn.
The requirements for entering the lottery vary depending on whether you are a private buyer or a representative of your free company.

　・Entering as a Private Buyer
　　1. You must have at least one class at level 50.
　　2. You must hold a rank of second lieutenant or above in one of the Grand Companies.

　・Entering as a Free Company Representative
　　1. Your free company must be authorized to acquire land.
　　2. Your free company must have four or more members.
　　3. You must be authorized by your free company to purchase and relinquish land.
　　4. You must have been a member of your free company for 30 days or longer.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>To purchase land in Empyreum, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Litany of Peace,” whether you are a private buyer or free company representative.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>To purchase land in Shirogane, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Not without Incident,” whether you are a private buyer or free company representative.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
　※Please note that all requirements listed above must be fulfilled at the time of both entry and purchase.


■Entry Deposits
To enter the lottery for a plot of land, you are required to pay the full sum of its value up front.

■Results
During the results period, you may confirm lottery results for a plot of land by accessing the placard located at its entrance.

　・Losing the Lottery
　　-You will receive a 100% refund of the deposit paid at entry.

　・Winning the Lottery
　　-You will be prompted to confirm the purchase of the plot of land.
　　-If purchasing a new plot, the amount of your deposit will be applied in full to your purchase, and you will receive no refund.
　　-If relocating from an existing plot, in principle, approximately 15% of the value of the old plot will be refunded to you.
　　※Please note that the refunded amount may not exceed the value of the new plot.
　　-You may finalize your purchase of a plot at any time during the results period. Once the results period has ended, however, you will automatically forfeit your claim to that plot.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>　　Should you fail to claim your plot of land, a 50% cancellation fee will be deducted from the deposit made at entry.
<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
※Regardless of lottery results, any and all refunds for a given lottery period expire 90 days (Earth time) after the results period.
Please be sure to access the same placard by which you entered the lottery within the allotted time. Failure to do so will result in a loss of any potential refunds.

　　-If relocating from an existing plot, in principle, approximately 15% of the value of the old plot will be refunded to you.
　　※Please note that the refunded amount may not exceed the value of the new plot.
　　-You may finalize your purchase of a plot at any time during the results period. Once the results period has ended, however, you will automatically forfeit your claim to that plot.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>　　Should you fail to claim your plot of land, a 50% cancellation fee will be deducted from the deposit made at entry.
<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
※Regardless of lottery results, any and all refunds for a given lottery period expire 90 days (Earth time) after the results period.
Please be sure to access the same placard by which you entered the lottery within the allotted time. Failure to do so will result in a loss of any potential refunds.

source: Usage Policy
target: Usage Policy

source: Instant portraits are designed to be shared with others. Please be considerate of your fellow players when using this feature, and keep your portrait composition respectful and appropriate for all situations. You may be flagged for content that is deemed inappropriate.
target: Instant portraits are designed to be shared with others. Please be considerate of your fellow players when using this feature, and keep your portrait composition respectful and appropriate for all situations. You may be flagged for content that is deemed inappropriate.

source: Adventurer Plate
target: Adventurer Plate

source: Adventurer Plate Basics
target: Adventurer Plate Basics

source:
The adventurer plate is a calling card by which to introduce yourself to other players.

Change your plate's design, customize your profile, affix your portrait, and let the world know your favorite class, job, title, and more!
target:
The adventurer plate is a calling card by which to introduce yourself to other players.

Change your plate's design, customize your profile, affix your portrait, and let the world know your favorite class, job, title, and more!

source: Plate Design
target: Plate Design

source: Editing Plate Design
target: Editing Plate Design

source:
Edit your adventurer plate's design by selecting the “Edit Plate Design” subcommand.

■Design Elements
Eight different plate design elements can be customized:
1. Base Plate
2. Pattern Overlay
3. Backing
4. Top Border
5. Bottom Border
6. Portrait Frame
7. Plate Frame
8. Accent

You can unlock further designs by completing quests, challenging duties, or fulfilling other in-game requirements, so be sure to keep a lookout during your travels!

source: Profile

Along with basic information such as your name, World name, and search comment, you have the option of customizing your profile with the following information:
1. Favored Class/Job
2. Favored Title
3. Playstyle
4. Active Hours

source: Portrait
target: Portrait

source: What Is a Portrait?
target: What Is a Portrait?

source:
You may create a still image of your character using the Portrait function. Make your portrait truly unique by customizing character poses, motions, backgrounds, and more.

■Characteristics of the Adventurer Plate Portrait
The portrait displayed on your adventurer plate reflects the gear and appearance of your character at the time of composition. It will continue to display unchanged even if you switch to a different class/job.
target:

■Characteristics of the Adventurer Plate Portrait

source: Editing Your Portrait
target: Editing Your Portrait

source:
■Accessing the Portrait Editor
After accessing the Adventurer Plate interface, select “Edit Portrait” from the menu.

■Retaining Gear/Appearance
You may edit portrait settings without changing the gear/appearance reflected in the portrait.

■Updating Gear/Appearance
Select “Reflect Current Gear” to update your character's gear/appearance without changing other portrait settings.
※Poses will revert to default settings if current gear belongs to a different class/job.

source: Privacy Settings

■Privacy Settings

      Visible to all players.

・Friends Only
      Visible only to players on your friend list.

      Visible to all players.

      Visible only to players on your friend list.
