From the Pasture Management menu, use either the “Collect Leavings & Resume Caretaking Services” or “Collect Leavings & End Caretaking Services” subcommand to collect the materials produced by your animals, and continue or quit caretaking services, respectively.

source: <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>The workshop provides a place for mammets to create handicrafts out of the materials obtained on your island.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target: <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Мастерская предоставляет мамметам место для создания изделий из материалов, полученных на вашем острове.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: After conveying a schedule of production to the tactful taskmaster, isleworks handicrafts will be automatically created and sold for a profit of seafarer's cowries. Make the most of the workshop's various features, and you'll soon be swimming in a sea of cowries!
target: После того как вы передадите тактичному задачнику график производства, изделия мастерской будут автоматически создаваться и продаваться с прибылью в виде seafarer's cowries. Используйте все возможности мастерской, и вскоре вы будете плавать в море cowries!

source: From sundry items to foodstuffs and furnishings, isleworks handicrafts are specialty goods created from your island's natural resources.
target: Ремесленные изделия мастерской, это специализированные товары, созданные из природных ресурсов вашего острова — от предметов домашнего обихода до продуктов питания и предметов обстановки.

source:
The following elements are crucial to isleworks handicraft creation:

・Materials
The production of handicrafts requires materials that can be gathered from the wilds of your island, the crops you grow, or the animals you keep.

・Time
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>The time it takes to create a given item is displayed in hours.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> In order to produce a given handicraft, a sufficient block of time must be available in the workshop's agenda.
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>※Please refer to “Agenda” for further details.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

・Value
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>The selling price of each handicraft is displayed in seafarer's cowries.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> As your workshop's level increases, so too will the value of the items it produces.

・Category
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Every isleworks handicraft falls under a certain category, which in turn affects efficiency bonuses.
※Please refer to “Efficiency Bonuses” for further details.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Additional handicrafts will become available for creation as your sanctuary rank increases.
target:
Следующие элементы имеют решающее значение для создания поделок в мастерской:

・Материалы
Для производства ремесленных изделий требуются материалы, которые можно собрать в дикой природе вашего острова, выращенные вами культуры или полученные от животных, которых вы содержите.

・Время
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Время, необходимое для создания предметов, отображается в реальных часах.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Для производства данного изделия в расписании мастерской должно быть достаточно времени.
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>※Подробности смотрите в разделе «Повестка дня».<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

・Значение
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Цена продажи каждого ремесла отображается в seafarer's cowries.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> По мере роста уровня вашей мастерской растёт и стоимость производимых ею предметов.

・Категория
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Каждое ремесло на острове относится к определённой категории, что в свою очередь влияет на бонусы эффективности.
Более подробную информацию см. в разделе «Бонусы эффективности».<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Дополнительные изделия станут доступны для создания по мере повышения Ранга на острове.

source:
The workshop's agenda indicates which isleworks handicrafts will be created at what time.

Speak with the tactful taskmaster near your cozy cabin to access the Isleworks Agenda interface, from which you may create, review, and edit the schedule of production.
target:
В расписании мастерской указано, какие изделия будут созданы в определённое время.

Поговорите с тактичным задачником около вашей уютной хижины, чтобы получить доступ к интерфейсу «Повестка дня», с помощью которого вы можете создавать, просматривать и редактировать расписание производства.

source: The following statuses may be reflected on the agenda.
target: В повестке дня могут быть отражены следующие статусы.

source:
①Pre-production
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Handicrafts in pre-production have been scheduled, but not yet created.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Production will begin at the time indicated on the agenda.

②In Production
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Handicrafts in production are currently being created.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

③Insufficient Material
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>You do not have the materials required for creating these handicrafts.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

④Shipped
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Shipped handicrafts have been completed and sold.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

■Setting the Agenda
To schedule handicrafts for production, select the plus button on the Isleworks Agenda interface.
target:
① Предпроизводство
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Изделия в предпроизводстве были запланированы, но ещё не начали создаваться.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Производство начнётся в указанное в повестке дня время.

② В производстве
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>В настоящее время создаются изделия, находящиеся в производстве.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

③Недостаточно материала
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>У вас нет материалов, необходимых для создания этих изделий.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

④Поставка
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Отправленные поделки были завершены и проданы.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

■ Установка повестки дня
Чтобы запланировать производство изделий, выберите кнопку «+» в интерфейсе «Повестки дня».

source:
Handicrafts available for production will be displayed in the Set Agenda window. By selecting your desired item followed by the Schedule button, creation of the handicraft will be added to the agenda.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>You may schedule handicrafts for production even if you do not currently have the necessary materials.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> As long as sufficient materials are acquired by the time of scheduled production, the handicraft will be created automatically.

■Clearing the Agenda
Handicrafts not yet in production may be erased from the schedule.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>While you can also clear the agenda of items currently in production, please note that the necessary materials will still be used and cannot be recovered.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

To erase all items in a given cycle, select the Clear Agenda button in the upper right-hand corner of the Isleworks Agenda interface.
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>※Please refer to “Cycles & Seasons” for further details on cycles.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

■Registering Presets
You may save a workshop's schedule for a given cycle and apply it to other workshops or future cycles.

Select the item from which the agenda preset should start, and choose “Register Preset” from the subcommands.
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>※You may save a maximum of 10 agenda presets.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

To apply an agenda preset to your schedule, choose the “Select Preset” subcommand from the plus button on the Isleworks Agenda interface. There is no limitation to the number of times you can apply a preset.
target:
Ремёсла, доступные для производства, будут отображаться в окне «Установка повестки дня». Выбрав нужный пункт и нажав кнопку «Расписание», создание ремесла будет добавлено в повестку дня.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Вы можете запланировать производство изделий, даже если у вас нет необходимых материалов.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Если к моменту запланированного производства будет получено достаточно материалов, ремесло будет создано автоматически.

■Очистка повестки дня
Изделия, которые ещё не находятся в производстве, могут быть удалены из расписания.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Хотя вы также можете очистить расписание от предметов, находящихся в производстве, обратите внимание, что необходимые материалы всё равно будут утрачены и не могут быть восстановлены.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Чтобы очистить все пункты в данном цикле, выберите кнопку «Очистить повестку» дня в правом верхнем углу интерфейса «Островная повестка дня».
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>※Дополнительные сведения о циклах см. в разделе «Циклы и сезоны».<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

■Регистрация предустановок
Вы можете сохранить расписание для данного цикла и применить его к другим или будущим циклам.

Выберите пункт, с которого должна начинаться предварительная установка расписания, и выберите «Регистрация предустановок» из доп. команд.
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var> ※Вы можете сохранить максимум 10 предустановок повестки дня.

Чтобы применить предустановку повестки дня к вашему расписанию, выберите команду «Выбрать предустановку» в кнопке «+» интерфейса «Повестки дня». Количество применений предустановок не ограничено.

source:
■Cycles and Seasons
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>The workshop's agenda is comprised of cycles and seasons.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

One cycle lasts 24 hours (Earth time), and one season lasts for seven cycles. <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>In other words, cycles are equivalent to Earth-time days and seasons to Earth-time weeks.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Agendas for the current season and next season may be viewed from the Isleworks Agenda interface.
target:
■ Циклы и сезоны
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Программа состоит из циклов и сезонов.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Один цикл длится 24 часа (реального времени), а один сезон длится семь циклов.<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var> Другими словами, циклы эквивалентны реальным земным дням, а сезоны — реальным земным неделям.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Планы на текущий и следующий сезон можно просмотреть в интерфейсе «Повестки дня».

source:
■Rest Cycles
As a conscientious employer, you are required to allocate 2 cycles of rest per season. During rest cycles, no handicrafts can be created.

You can schedule and review rest cycles by selecting the Set Rest Cycles option in the upper right-hand corner of the Isleworks Agenda interface.
target:
■Циклы отдыха
Как добросовестный работодатель, вы обязаны выделять 2 цикла отдыха раз в сезон. Во время циклов отдыха нельзя создавать изделия.

Вы можете запланировать и просмотреть циклы отдыха, выбрав опцию «Установить циклы отдыха» в правом верхнем углу интерфейса «Повестки дня».

source:
■Production and Shipping
Mammets will automatically proceed with scheduled handicraft creation and shipping if all necessary materials have been acquired by the start of production. You may use your time freely while they work.

■Collecting Earnings
Once handicrafts have been successfully completed and shipped, you may collect your profits by speaking with the tactful taskmaster.
target:
■Производство и отправка
Мамметы автоматически приступят к запланированному созданию и отправке изделий, если к началу производства будут доступны все необходимые материалы. Пока они работают, вы можете свободно использовать своё время.

■Получение дохода
После того как изделия будут успешно завершены и отправлены, вы можете получить свою прибыль, поговорив с тактичным задачником.

source: Your mammets will get into the groove of production when creating isleworks handicrafts within the same category. You will receive an efficiency bonus for scheduling such items in sequence, which will become outlined in blue on the Isleworks Agenda interface.
target: Ваши мамметы войдут в ритм производства при создании изделий в одной и той же категории. Вы получите бонус эффективности за последовательное планирование таких предметов, которые будут выделены синим цветом в интерфейсе «Повестки дня».

source:
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Efficiency bonuses will cause those handicrafts produced immediately after similarly categorized crafts to be produced twofold, thereby doubling earnings.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Even though double the handicrafts will be created under an efficiency bonus, no additional materials are required.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Furthermore, efficiency bonuses may be chained.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Using efficiency bonuses strategically can vastly increase your workshop's earnings.

■Limitations
Efficiency bonuses will not be applied to the same item created in sequence. Additionally, efficiency bonuses are only applicable within a given cycle, and will not carry over to the following cycle.

■Groove
When efficiency bonuses are triggered, your mammets' happy production groove will intensify. High groove scores will apply a further bonus to profits when handicrafts are shipped.

Groove is reset at the beginning of each season. Maximum groove attainable will also increase with the number of landmarks constructed on your island.
target:
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Бонусы эффективности могут произвести изделия, произведённые сразу после изделий аналогичной категории, в два раза больше, тем самым удваивая доход.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Несмотря на то, что при бонусе эффективности будет создано вдвое больше изделий, дополнительные материалы не потребуются.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Кроме того, бонусы эффективности можно соединять в цепочки.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Стратегическое использование бонусов эффективности может значительно увеличить доходы вашей мастерской.

■Ограничения
Бонусы эффективности не будут применяться к одному и тому же предмету, созданному последовательно. Кроме того, бонусы эффективности применимы только в данном цикле и не переносятся на следующий цикл.

■Рост
Когда срабатывают бонусы эффективности, счастливая линия производства ваших мамметов усиливается. Высокие показатели на линии дают дополнительный бонус к прибыли при отгрузке ремесленных изделий.

В начале каждого сезона показатель обнуляется. Максимально достижимый бонус на лини также увеличивается с ростом количества ориентиров, построенных на вашем острове.

source: <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>The granary will send mammets to various locations throughout your island to forage for resources.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target: <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Зернохранилище будет отправлять мамметов в различные места по всему вашему острову для добычи ресурсов.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source:
Foraging expeditions yield an array of materials, some of which are designated as “rare” and can only be obtained via the granary's services.

Construct a granary in a vacant plot to unlock foraging expeditions.
target:
Экспедиции сборщиков дают множество материалов, некоторые из которых обозначены как «редкие» и могут быть получены только с помощью услуг зернохранилища.

Постройте зернохранилище на свободном участке, чтобы открыть кормовые экспедиции.

source: Schedule foraging expeditions by speaking with the excitable explorer outside the cozy cabin.
target: Планируйте экспедиции сборщиков, поговорив с Взволнованным исследователем около уютной хижины.

source: Choose “Select Terrain” in the Foraging Expeditions window to review the locations to which you may send a team of exploratory mammets.
target: Выберите «Выбрать местность» в окне «Экспедиции сборщиков», чтобы просмотреть места, в которые вы можете отправить команду исследовательских мамметов.

source:
Each terrain on your island yields different materials. After choosing your desired expedition area, indicate the number of days you wish your mammets to forage, then press Confirm.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Mammets will return with the materials they have gathered thus far at <var 06 12 /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time) every day until the foraging expedition is over.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Constructing landmarks and renovating your granaries will increase the amount of materials your mammets can gather.
target:
Each terrain on your island yields different materials. After choosing your desired expedition area, indicate the number of days you wish your mammets to forage, then press Confirm.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Mammets will return with the materials they have gathered thus far at <var 06 12 /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time) every day until the foraging expedition is over.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Constructing landmarks and renovating your granaries will increase the amount of materials your mammets can gather.

source: Accept materials gathered from foraging expeditions by speaking with the excitable explorer outside of the cozy cabin and selecting the Collect button, located under the Expedition Terrain image.
target: Забирайте материалы, собранные в экспедициях сборщиков, поговорив с Взволнованным исследователем около уютной хижины и нажав кнопку «Собрать», расположенную под изображением местности экспедиции.

source: <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Any minion in your possession may freely wander within your hideaway.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target: <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Любой миньон в вашем владении может свободно бродить по вашему убежищу.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source:
Select Manage Minions from the islekeep's index to access the
Free-range Minions menu and get started.
target: Выберите «Управление миньонами» в основном меню, затем выберите нужный участок и любимых миньонов.

source:
■Release the Minions!
The Free-range Minions menu displays the current population of released minions in each available area. After selecting your desired area, press Select Minions and let loose your tiny friends via subcommand.
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>You can release one of each minion, up to a starting maximum of 40 minions. You will be able to release more minions as your island development progresses.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Please note that your minions are enjoying this island paradise as much as you are, and may therefore seem different than they do when accompanying you on your journeys.

You will find that the nameplates of minions roaming the isle will display according to the selected mode in the islekeep's index, irrespective of your character configuration settings. While the “Free” mode is active, minions can be targeted, and their names will be displayed. Conversely, while any other mode is active, they cannot be targeted, and their names will no longer display.

■Retrieving Individual Minions
From the Free-range Minions menu, use the “Retrieve Minion” subcommand on the minion you wish to recall.
target:
■Release the Minions!
The Free-range Minions menu displays the current population of released minions in each available area. After selecting your desired area, press Select Minions and let loose your tiny friends via subcommand.
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>You can release one of each minion, up to a starting maximum of 40 minions. You will be able to release more minions as your island development progresses.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Please note that your minions are enjoying this island paradise as much as you are, and may therefore seem different than they do when accompanying you on your journeys.

You will find that the nameplates of minions roaming the isle will display according to the selected mode in the islekeep's index, irrespective of your character configuration settings. While the “Free” mode is active, minions can be targeted, and their names will be displayed. Conversely, while any other mode is active, they cannot be targeted, and their names will no longer display.

■Retrieving Individual Minions
From the Free-range Minions menu, use the “Retrieve Minion” subcommand on the minion you wish to recall.

source: Viewing Adventurer Plates
target: Viewing Adventurer Plates

source:
You may view another player's adventurer plate by accessing the “View Adventurer Plate” subcommand when targeting them or from their name when listed in the windows and features below:

・Log window
・Party list
・Party members
・Friend list
・Player search
・Linkshell
・Cross-world linkshell
・Free company
・Fellowship
・Contact list

source: Portrait Composition
target: Portrait Composition

source:
Each element of a portrait can be adjusted. Adjustable settings are as follows:

■Design
Background/Frame/Accent

■Character
Pose/Expression/Facial Direction/Gaze Direction

■Lighting
Ambient/Directional

■Camera
・Tilt (Tumble)
・Distance (Dolly)
・Positioning (Track)
・Rotation (Roll)
・Lens (Zoom)
target:
Each element of a portrait can be adjusted. Adjustable settings are as follows:

■Design
Background/Frame/Accent

■Character
Pose/Expression/Facial Direction/Gaze Direction

■Lighting
Ambient/Directional

■Camera
・Tilt (Tumble)
・Distance (Dolly)
・Positioning (Track)
・Rotation (Roll)
・Lens (Zoom)

source: Design Settings
target: Design Settings

source:
The following design settings can be adjusted:
1. Background
2. Frame
3. Accent

Background designs will appear behind the portrait subject, whereas frames and accents will be layered on top.
target:
The following design settings can be adjusted:
1. Background
2. Frame
3. Accent

Background designs will appear behind the portrait subject, whereas frames and accents will be layered on top.

source: Character Settings
target: Character Settings

source:
The following character settings can be adjusted:
1. Pose
2. Expression
3. Facial and Gaze Direction

■Pose
Select from a variety of emotes and actions, and choose whether to pause or play motions to create your desired pose.

■Expression
Adjust your facial expression independently from chosen pose.

■Facial and Gaze Direction
Choose whether your face and gaze are directed toward the camera or elsewhere.
※These settings are unavailable when using certain poses, such as actions and some emotes.
target:
The following character settings can be adjusted:
1. Pose
2. Expression
3. Facial and Gaze Direction

■Pose
Select from a variety of emotes and actions, and choose whether to pause or play motions to create your desired pose.

■Expression
Adjust your facial expression independently from chosen pose.

■Facial and Gaze Direction
Choose whether your face and gaze are directed toward the camera or elsewhere.
※These settings are unavailable when using certain poses, such as actions and some emotes.

source: Lighting Settings
target: Lighting Settings

source:
The following lighting settings can be adjusted:
1. Ambient Lighting
2. Directional Lighting

■Ambient Lighting
Settings in this category affect the brightness and color values of the portrait as a whole.

■Directional Lighting
Settings in this category affect the positioning, brightness, and color values of the directional light source.
target:
The following lighting settings can be adjusted:
1. Ambient Lighting
2. Directional Lighting

■Ambient Lighting
Settings in this category affect the brightness and color values of the portrait as a whole.

■Directional Lighting
Settings in this category affect the positioning, brightness, and color values of the directional light source.

source: Camera Settings
target: Camera Settings

source:
The following settings concerning the camera's placement and focal point can be adjusted:
・Tilt (Tumble)
・Distance (Dolly)
・Positioning (Track)
・Rotation (Roll)
・Lens (Zoom)

■Tilt (Tumble)
This setting affects the camera angle with respect to the focal point (your character). It can be adjusted using the right stick on a <var 08 E4E94C01 ((gamepad)) ((controller)) /var> or by left-clicking and dragging the mouse.
※Use of the positioning (track) settings may change the portrait's focal point.

■Distance (Dolly)
Camera distance functions similarly to the zoom function in the overworld. It can be adjusted by pressing <var 1E 0D /var> and tilting the right stick on a <var 08 E4E94C01 ((gamepad)) ((controller)) /var>, or by scrolling with the mouse wheel while the cursor is over your portrait.

■Positioning (Track)
Positioning moves the focal point both horizontally and vertically, and can be adjusted via the left stick on a <var 08 E4E94C01 ((gamepad)) ((controller)) /var>, or by right-clicking and dragging the mouse while the cursor is over your portrait.

■Rotation (Roll)
This slider, found below the portrait currently being edited, rotates the camera itself to adjust the direction of its focus.

■Lens (Zoom)
As opposed to the camera itself, this setting affects the camera lens's zoom to make the field of view wider or narrower. Its slider is also found below the portrait.
target:

■Tilt (Tumble)
This setting affects the camera angle with respect to the focal point (your character). It can be adjusted using the right stick on a <var 08 E4E94C01 ((gamepad)) ((controller)) /var> or by left-clicking and dragging the mouse.
※Use of the positioning (track) settings may change the portrait's focal point.

■Distance (Dolly)
Camera distance functions similarly to the zoom function in the overworld. It can be adjusted by pressing <var 1E 0D /var> and tilting the right stick on a <var 08 E4E94C01 ((gamepad)) ((controller)) /var>, or by scrolling with the mouse wheel while the cursor is over your portrait.

■Positioning (Track)
Positioning moves the focal point both horizontally and vertically, and can be adjusted via the left stick on a <var 08 E4E94C01 ((gamepad)) ((controller)) /var>, or by right-clicking and dragging the mouse while the cursor is over your portrait.

source: Saving Portraits
target: Saving Portraits

source:
You may save and display your completed portrait using the button at the bottom of the portrait editor window assuming that the following conditions are met:
1. Your character is visible in the portrait.
2. Their expression is visible in the portrait.

■Character Visibility
Certain camera or focal point placements may leave your character out of the frame. Adjust these settings so that your character can be seen.

■Expression Visibility
Certain camera or focal point placements may leave your character's expression out of the frame. Adjust these settings so that the expression can be seen.
target:
You may save and display your completed portrait using the button at the bottom of the portrait editor window assuming that the following conditions are met:
1. Your character is visible in the portrait.
2. Their expression is visible in the portrait.

■Character Visibility
Certain camera or focal point placements may leave your character out of the frame. Adjust these settings so that your character can be seen.

■Expression Visibility
Certain camera or focal point placements may leave your character's expression out of the frame. Adjust these settings so that the expression can be seen.

source: Search Comment
target: Search Comment

source: Editing Your Search Comment
target: Editing Your Search Comment

source:
After accessing the Adventurer Plate interface, select “Edit Search Comment” from the menu.

Please note that the same search comment will display on both your adventurer plate and in search info.
target:
After accessing the Adventurer Plate interface, select “Edit Search Comment” from the menu.

Please note that the same search comment will display on both your adventurer plate and in search info.

source: Precautions
target: Precautions

source: Using Fantasia
target: Using Fantasia

source:
The transformative nature of Fantasia results in the alteration of your character's appearance, from subtle adjustments to a complete change in race or gender. As such, adventurer plate portraits will revert to default settings, requiring you to create a new image that reflects your character's updated appearance.

Please note that after using Fantasia, your adventurer plate will become temporarily hidden from other players. You may make it public again by updating its settings.
target:
The transformative nature of Fantasia results in the alteration of your character's appearance, from subtle adjustments to a complete change in race or gender. As such, adventurer plate portraits will revert to default settings, requiring you to create a new image that reflects your character's updated appearance.

Please note that after using Fantasia, your adventurer plate will become temporarily hidden from other players. You may make it public again by updating its settings.

source: Usage Policy
target: Usage Policy

source: Adventurer plates and portraits are designed to be shared with others. Please be considerate of your fellow players when using these features, and keep your plate/portrait composition respectful and appropriate for all situations. You may be flagged for content that is deemed inappropriate.
target: Adventurer plates and portraits are designed to be shared with others. Please be considerate of your fellow players when using these features, and keep your plate/portrait composition respectful and appropriate for all situations. You may be flagged for content that is deemed inappropriate.

source: Copying Portrait Settings
target: Copying Portrait Settings

source:
You may import settings from other portraits to create a similar image with a different gear set.

■How to Copy Portrait Settings
Choose the portrait you wish to apply the copied settings to, and select the subcommand “Import Settings.” A pop-up window will appear.

■Choose the Source Portrait
From the dropdown menu, select the portrait whose settings you wish to copy. A preview of the applied changes will be displayed. If you are satisfied with the image, select “Confirm” and the settings will be copied and imported to the target portrait.

■Copying Poses
If pose settings of the source portrait are incompatible with the target portrait, pose/camera settings will revert to default.
target:
You may import settings from other portraits to create a similar image with a different gear set.

■How to Copy Portrait Settings
Choose the portrait you wish to apply the copied settings to, and select the subcommand “Import Settings.” A pop-up window will appear.

■Choose the Source Portrait
From the dropdown menu, select the portrait whose settings you wish to copy. A preview of the applied changes will be displayed. If you are satisfied with the image, select “Confirm” and the settings will be copied and imported to the target portrait.

■Copying Poses
If pose settings of the source portrait are incompatible with the target portrait, pose/camera settings will revert to default.

source: Restoring Default Settings
target: Restoring Default Settings

source: Use the “Restore Default Settings” subcommand to revert all portrait elements back to their original settings.
target: Use the “Restore Default Settings” subcommand to revert all portrait elements back to their original settings.

source: Isleworks for Beginners
target: Островные мастерские для начинающих

source: What Happens at the Workshop?
target: Что происходит в мастерской?

source: Scheduling Basics
target: Основы планирования

source: Congratulations! You have built your very own workshop, where you may make and sell isleworks handicrafts.
target: Поздравляем! Вы построили свою собственную мастерскую, в которой вы можете создавать, а после и продавать различные изделия.

source:
Isleworks handicrafts are artisanal goods made from your island's natural resources. Traders in Limsa Lominsa will be happy to pay a sum of seafarer's cowries in exchange for these goods, allowing you to live your dream of running an island-based small business!

In case breaking a sweat isn't your cup of tea, fear not─a team of mammets will create and ship all handicrafts for you. You need only speak to the tactful taskmaster to design the production schedule, then sit back, relax, and watch the cowries pour in.
target:
Ремесленные изделия — это кустарные товары, изготовленные из природных ресурсов вашего острова. Торговцы в Лимса Ломинсе с радостью заплатят за эти товары сумму в seafarer's cowries, что позволит вам осуществить свою мечту — организовать малый бизнес на острове!

Если вы не любите всё делать своими руками, не волнуйтесь — команда мамметов создаст и отправит все поделки за вас. Вам нужно только поговорить с тактичным задачником, чтобы составить график производства, а затем откинуться на спинку кресла, расслабиться и наблюдать за тем, как cowries прибывают в ваш кошелёк.

source:
Managing a workshop's schedule may seem daunting at first, but once you grasp the basics, handicraft production will feel as refreshing as a tropical breeze! As an example, let's try scheduling the production of an isleworks potion.

■Press Plus to Schedule
The plus button on the Isleworks Agenda screen indicates an opening in your schedule. Select this button to get started.
target:
Поначалу управление расписанием мастерской может показаться сложным, но как только вы освоите основы, ремесленное производство станет таким же освежающим, как тропический бриз! В качестве примера давайте попробуем составить расписание производства «островного зелья».

■Нажмите иконку «+», чтобы составить расписание
Эта кнопка указывает на свободное место в вашем расписании. Нажимайте, и начинайте работу.

source:
■Choose Your Handicraft
After pressing the plus button, a menu of all handicrafts currently available for production will open. In keeping with our example, select “Isleworks Potion” from the list. You will notice that the materials required to create a given handicraft are displayed on this screen, but you can still schedule an item even if you don't have all the materials just yet.

Use the Schedule button to set your agenda!
target:
■Выбор ремесла
После нажатия кнопки «+» откроется меню всех ремёсел, доступных в настоящее время для производства. В соответствии с нашим примером, выберите из списка «островное зелье». Вы заметите, что на этом экране отображаются материалы, необходимые для создания данного ремесла, но вы всё равно можете запланировать изготовление предмета, даже если у вас ещё нет всех материалов.

source:
■Export Your Items and Reap Your Rewards!
Now that you have set an agenda, your faithful team of crafty mammets will create and export all the handicrafts you ordered while you bask in the sunshine and imbibe refreshing liquids.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>An isleworks potion takes four hours (Earth time) to produce.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Remember: those who would judge a mammet for the time it takes to produce a handicraft are not worthy of that goodly mammet.

After the designated time has passed, put down your beverage long enough to speak with the tactful taskmaster once more, and your pockets will be filled with the earnings from your most recent export!

■Managing Materials
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Materials used for the creation of a handicraft will be depleted at the start of production.

If you do not possess the required materials by the time production is scheduled to begin, your mammets will be unable to create the handicraft you ordered.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> They might even cry due to feelings of inadequacy.

So, if you did not have enough island palm leaves or islewort when you scheduled the isleworks potion, be sure to gather two of each by the time production is scheduled to start. Don't be the Warrior of Light who made a mammet cry.

You can keep track of what materials will be expended during current or upcoming production by clicking the Review Materials button.
target:
■Экспортируйте свои изделия и пожинайте плоды!
Теперь, когда вы определились с планом действий, ваша верная команда умелых мамметов будет создавать и экспортировать все заказанные вами изделия, пока вы греетесь на солнышке и пьёте освежающие жидкости.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>К примеру на изготовление островного зелья уходит четыре часа (реального времени).<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>Помните: те, кто осуждает маммета за долгое время работы, затраченное на изготовление изделий, недостойны этого доброго маммета.

По истечении назначенного времени отложите свой напиток, чтобы ещё раз поговорить с тактичным задачником, и ваши карманы наполнятся доходами от вашего последнего экспорта!

■Управление материалами
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Материалы, используемые для создания ремесла, истощаются в начале производства.

Если у вас не будет необходимых материалов к началу производства, ваши мамметы не смогут создать заказанное вами изделие.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Они могут даже заплакать из-за чувства неполноценности.

Поэтому, если у вас не было достаточно листьев островной пальмы или сусла, когда вы планировали создать островное зелье, обязательно соберите по две штуки к моменту начала производства. Не будьте тем Воином Света, который заставил плакать маммета.

Вы можете следить за тем, какие материалы будут израсходованы в ходе текущего или предстоящего производства, нажав кнопку «Просмотр материалов».

source: Reviewing Materials
target: Просмотр материалов

source: Reviewing Earnings
target: Анализ доходов

source: Tricks of the Trade
target: Хитрости торговли

source:
Earnings are not only influenced by factors like workshop level and groove, but the popularity and current supply of handicrafts.

Navigating the nuances of market demand will offer you even greater profits than simply renovating your facilities or activating efficiency bonuses.

■Market Research
You may review the current state of the market by selecting the “Review Supply & Demand” button in the top right-hand corner of the Isleworks Agenda interface.
target:
Доход зависит не только от уровня вашей мастерской, но и от спроса и текущего предложения ремесленных изделий.

Ориентируясь в нюансах рыночного спроса, вы сможете получить даже большую прибыль, чем просто улучшив мастерские или активировав бонусы эффективности.

■Исследование рынка
Вы можете просмотреть текущее состояние рынка, выбрав кнопку «Обзор спроса и предложения» в правом верхнем углу интерфейса повестки дня.

source:
・Popularity
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Items will be in one of the following four states of popularity: Very High, High, Average, and Low.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

The more popular an item is, the higher it will sell for.

Popularity may change at the beginning of a new season, but it will remain constant throughout that season.

・Supply
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Items will be in one of the following fives stages of supply: Nonexistent, Insufficient, Sufficient, Surplus, and Overflowing.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

The less abundant an item is, the higher it will sell for.

Furthermore, the supply of handicrafts may change each cycle according to both commercial trends in Limsa Lominsa and the type/amount of items you sell from your island.

You can check shifts in demand from the previous cycle to the current one by referencing the “Demand Shift” column of the Supply & Demand interface.

If you produce too much of the same product, the market will be inundated with it, causing supply to become “Overflowing.” Pay special attention to changes in the market when looking to create a large amount of a single kind of handicraft.
target:
・Популярность
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Элементы будут находиться в одном из следующих четырёх состояний популярности: Очень высокая, Высокая, Средняя и Низкая.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Чем популярнее предмет, тем дороже он будет продаваться.

Популярность может измениться в начале нового сезона, но она будет оставаться постоянной в течение всего сезона.

・Поставки
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Товары будут находиться на одной из следующих пяти стадий предложения: Отсутствуют, Недостаток, Достаток, Излишки и Переполнено.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Чем в меньших количествах предлагается товар, тем дороже он будет продаваться.

Кроме того, предложение ремесленных изделий может меняться каждый цикл в зависимости как от коммерческих тенденций в Лимса Ломинсе, так и от типа/количества товаров, которые вы продаёте со своего острова.

Вы можете проверить изменение спроса с предыдущего цикла на текущий, обратившись к колонке «Сдвиг спроса» в интерфейсе «Спрос и предложение».

Если вы производите слишком много одного и того же товара, рынок будет переполнен им, что приведёт к «Переполнению». Обращайте особое внимание на изменения на рынке, когда хотите создать большое количество одного вида изделий.

source: A variety of resources are necessary for the production of handicrafts. You may confirm what materials are required for your workshop's current schedule by selecting “Review Materials” and accessing the Material Allocation interface.
target: Для производства ремесленных изделий необходимы различные ресурсы. Вы можете подтвердить, какие материалы необходимы для текущего расписания вашей мастерской, выбрав «Обзор материалов» и получив доступ к интерфейсу распределения материалов.

source: You may review the necessary materials for the current cycle, current season, or both current and next season. If a deficit appears for any materials, please be sure to acquire them by the start of scheduled production.
target: Вы можете просмотреть необходимые материалы для текущего цикла, текущего сезона или как совокупность текущего со следующим сезонами. Если возникнет дефицит каких-либо материалов, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что они будут приобретены к началу запланированного производства.

source: You may review a record of your recent profits by speaking with the tactful taskmaster and selecting “Review earnings.”
target: Вы можете просмотреть запись своей недавней прибыли, поговорив с тактичным задачником и выбрав «Просмотреть доход».

source:
The Earnings Report displays total profits for the current season, the previous season, and the highest recorded profits for any season.

The value of the handicrafts you sell will fluctuate depending on their popularity and demand at the time they are sold. You can check the fluctuation in their value by reviewing the “Value Change” column in the earnings report menu.

If your earnings for a particular season are not what you expected, be sure to check how the handicrafts you chose may have affected market supply and demand.
target:
The Earnings Report displays total profits for the current season, the previous season, and the highest recorded profits for any season.

The value of the handicrafts you sell will fluctuate depending on their popularity and demand at the time they are sold. You can check the fluctuation in their value by reviewing the “Value Change” column in the earnings report menu.

If your earnings for a particular season are not what you expected, be sure to check how the handicrafts you chose may have affected market supply and demand.

source:
Mastering the intricacies of isleworks production and trade begins with a close examination of the materials available to you and the strategic implementation of efficiency bonuses.

For those islekeeps who feel like they have a firm grasp on the basics, the following tips will help you take your island industry─and earnings─to the next level.


■Popular Items Sell Even Better When Scarce
When a handicraft has High or Very High popularity, the inclination may be to produce large quantities of it, as popularity increases selling price. However, simply selling lots of a popular item will result in Overflowing supply for future cycles, which may ultimately undercut potential earnings.

By waiting to sell a popular handicraft during cycles in which its supply is Nonexistent, you can optimize your profits while keeping the markets in balance.

Demand Shift may prove a helpful indicator of how supply levels will behave in coming cycles. For example, if an Insufficient handicraft is showing a Skyrocketing demand shift, one might reasonably expect it to reach Nonexistent supply by the following cycle.


■Start the Season Short and Efficient
Levels of groove increase with the number of efficiency bonuses activated during production. Therefore, securing as many efficiency bonuses as you can at the beginning of a season allows you to benefit from the effects of maximum groove for longer.

To quickly activate efficiency bonuses, schedule applicable handicrafts that require relatively short production times. Handicrafts that take longer to produce typically fetch a higher price, so waiting to create these items until groove is high will maximize your earnings without flooding supply.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Strategically utilizing factors such as groove and paying close attention to production time will help increase the value of the handicrafts you sell.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target:

For those islekeeps who feel like they have a firm grasp on the basics, the following tips will help you take your island industry─and earnings─to the next level.


■Popular Items Sell Even Better When Scarce
When a handicraft has High or Very High popularity, the inclination may be to produce large quantities of it, as popularity increases selling price. However, simply selling lots of a popular item will result in Overflowing supply for future cycles, which may ultimately undercut potential earnings.

To quickly activate efficiency bonuses, schedule applicable handicrafts that require relatively short production times. Handicrafts that take longer to produce typically fetch a higher price, so waiting to create these items until groove is high will maximize your earnings without flooding supply.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Strategically utilizing factors such as groove and paying close attention to production time will help increase the value of the handicrafts you sell.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: Efficiency Bonuses
target: Бонусы за эффективность

source: The Path to Profits
target: Путь к прибыли

source:
With an agenda in hand and a team of eager mammets at your disposal, you are free to make any and all handicrafts your heart desires. However, a very special bonus awaits those who choose their schedules cleverly.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>The efficiency bonus will double the production of a given handicraft without requiring additional materials or production time.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Doubling the production of a handicraft means you will have two handicrafts to export, and basic mathematics tells us that two handicrafts will sell for twice as much as one handicraft will. So what are you waiting for? Activate those efficiency bonuses by following the steps below!

■Activating Efficiency Bonuses
All handicrafts belong to at least one item category, such as “Concoctions” or “Confections.”

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Efficiency bonuses are activated by scheduling the production of similarly categorized items in direct succession.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

For example, an isleworks potion and isleworks firesand are both classified as “Concoctions.” By scheduling production of isleworks firesand right after your isleworks potion, you will activate an efficiency bonus that creates two pinches of isleworks firesand with the same time and materials it would normally take to make one!

But you don't have to keep track of all your bonuses in that steel-trap mind of yours─the text “Efficiency Bonus!” will appear on the agenda for items that will be produced twice as a result of your clever scheduling.
target:
Имея на руках план действий и команду нетерпеливых мамметов, вы можете свободно мастерить любые поделки, какие только пожелает ваша душа. Однако тех, кто грамотно выберет своё расписание, ждёт особый бонус.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Бонус эффективности удвоит производство данного ремесла, не требуя дополнительных материалов или времени на производство.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

Удвоение производства ремесла означает, что у вас будет два изделия вместо одного для экспорта, а элементарная математика говорит нам, это и продаваться будет в два раза дороже, чем одно изделие. Так чего же вы ждёте? Активируйте бонусы эффективности, выполнив следующие шаги!

■Активация бонусов эффективности
Все ремёсла принадлежат хотя бы к одной категории предметов, например, «Продукты» или «Кондитерские изделия».

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Бонусы эффективности активируются при планировании производства предметов, относящихся к одной категории, в прямой последовательности.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

Например, «островное зелье» и «островной порох» классифицируются как «Медицина». Запланировав производство «островного пороха» сразу после изготовления «островного зелья», вы активируете бонус эффективности, который позволит создать две щепотки «островного пороха» за то же время и те же материалы, которые обычно требуются для изготовления одной порции!

Но вам не нужно отслеживать все бонусы в своём разуме, так как текст «Бонус эффективности!» появится на повестке дня для предметов, которые будут произведены дважды в результате вашего умного планирования.

source:
But wait! There's more.

What if you scheduled an isleworks potion, followed by a pinch of isleworks firesand, followed by <var 1A 02 /var>another<var 1A 01 /var> isleworks potion?

Thanks to efficiency bonuses, what might have been only three handicrafts has now been expanded to five! Think of the profits! Keep in mind both the type and order of handicrafts you add to your agenda, and you will be swimming in an abundance of seafarer's cowries in no time.

■Limitations of the Efficiency Bonus
Unfortunately, due to the peculiarities of the mammet's psyche, your tiny workers will not be nearly as excited making the same item twice in a row. While an isleworks potion/isleworks firesand combination will earn you an efficiency bonus, an order of isleworks potion/isleworks potion will get you nothing but some blinking and basic adherence to general protocol.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>In other words, only different items belonging to the same category can activate efficiency bonuses.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

When aiming for bonuses, be sure you are scheduling different handicrafts. Variety, after all, is the spice of island life.
target:
Но подождите! Это ещё не всё.

Что, если вы запланировали isleworks potion, затем щепотку isleworks firesand, затем <var 1A 02 /var>снова<var 1A 01 /var> isleworks potion?

Благодаря бонусам к эффективности, то, что могло быть всего тремя изделиями, теперь станет пятью! Представляете, какая будет прибыль! Следите за типом и порядком изделий, которые вы добавляете в свою программу, и вы в мгновение ока будете купаться в изобилии seafarer's cowries.

■Ограничения бонуса эффективности
К сожалению, из-за особенностей психики мамметов ваши крошечные работники не будут с таким же удовольствием делать один и тот же предмет два раза подряд. Комбинация isleworks potion и isleworks firesand принесёт вам бонус к эффективности, в то время как заказ isleworks potion и isleworks potion не даст вам ничего, кроме стресса у ваших мамметов.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Иными словами, только разные предметы, принадлежащие к одной категории, могут активировать бонусы к эффективности.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

Стремясь получить бонусы, убедитесь, что вы планируете разные изделия. Разнообразие, в конце концов, это специи островной жизни.

source:
Now that you have taken your first steps down the path to profits, you may be curious as to how to increase your earnings even further than what a simple efficiency bonus might afford.

When you feel ready to take the plunge into the intricacies of the handicraft trade, access the Guide in your islekeep's index and check the section titled “The Workshop.”

But for now, perhaps continue enjoying that refreshing beverage─you've earned it!
target:
Теперь, когда вы сделали первые шаги на пути к прибыли, вам может быть интересно, как увеличить свой заработок ещё больше, чем это можно сделать с помощью простого бонуса за эффективность.

Когда вы почувствуете, что готовы погрузиться в тонкости ремесленного ремесла, откройте «Руководство» в главной табличке вашего острова и загляните в раздел «Мастерская».

А пока, возможно, продолжите наслаждаться освежающим напитком — вы его заслужили!

source: The Palace of the Dead
target: The Palace of the Dead

source: Entry
target: Entry

source:
You may enter the Palace of the Dead solo or in a party of up to four players. When speaking with the Wood Wailer expeditionary captain, you will be given the option to enter with a fixed party or a matched party via the matching system.

To create a fixed party, the party leader must speak with the Wood Wailer expeditionary captain after forming a party of up to four players. Please note that all party members must have at least one unused save slot.
target:
You may enter the Palace of the Dead solo or in a party of up to four players. When speaking with the Wood Wailer expeditionary captain, you will be given the option to enter with a fixed party or a matched party via the matching system.

To create a fixed party, the party leader must speak with the Wood Wailer expeditionary captain after forming a party of up to four players. Please note that all party members must have at least one unused save slot.

source: Progress
target: Progress

source:
Players must activate the Cairn of Passage that appears on each floor in order to progress. These stones can only be activated when all nearby enemies are defeated.

Especially powerful enemies can be found on certain floors. Players can save their progress in the Palace of the Dead upon defeating these enemies. In the event all party members are incapacitated, however, you will be removed from the Palace of the Dead and must resume from your last save point.
target:
Players must activate the Cairn of Passage that appears on each floor in order to progress. These stones can only be activated when all nearby enemies are defeated.

Especially powerful enemies can be found on certain floors. Players can save their progress in the Palace of the Dead upon defeating these enemies. In the event all party members are incapacitated, however, you will be removed from the Palace of the Dead and must resume from your last save point.

source: Saving Progress
target: Saving Progress

source: Players can save their progress in the Palace of the Dead by defeating the boss enemies that appear on certain floors. After saving one's progress, players can resume their foray into the Palace of the Dead immediately or return at a later time. Players who choose to leave and return later will start on the floor following their last save point.
target: Players can save their progress in the Palace of the Dead by defeating the boss enemies that appear on certain floors. After saving one's progress, players can resume their foray into the Palace of the Dead immediately or return at a later time. Players who choose to leave and return later will start on the floor following their last save point.

source: Leveling Up
target: Leveling Up

source:
Players who enter from floor 1 will start at level 1 regardless of their current class or job level. Players who enter from floor 51, however, will start at level 60.

If your job or class level is below 90 upon entering the deep dungeon, experience points will be rewarded based on progress.
target:
Players who enter from floor 1 will start at level 1 regardless of their current class or job level. Players who enter from floor 51, however, will start at level 60.

If your job or class level is below 90 upon entering the deep dungeon, experience points will be rewarded based on progress.

source: Learning Actions
target: Learning Actions

source:
As you gain levels within the Palace of the Dead, you will also relearn actions and traits for your selected class or job. You will continue to acquire actions and traits as you normally would even should your level in the Palace of the Dead exceed your actual class or job level.

Any role actions acquired prior to entering the Palace of the Dead will be available immediately upon entry.
target:
As you gain levels within the Palace of the Dead, you will also relearn actions and traits for your selected class or job. You will continue to acquire actions and traits as you normally would even should your level in the Palace of the Dead exceed your actual class or job level.

Any role actions acquired prior to entering the Palace of the Dead will be available immediately upon entry.

source: Precautions
target: Precautions

source:
It is possible to receive a score for your performance in the Palace of the Dead. In order to do so, you must enter with a fixed party.

A fixed party is also required to challenge floor 100 and beyond. Moreover, your Party KO count must be zero. Please note that the Party KO count will also increase in the event your party abandons the duty.
target:

source: Resetting Progress
target: Resetting Progress

source: Resetting Progress
target: Resetting Progress

source: It is possible to reset your progression in the Palace of the Dead, allowing you to re-enter the deep dungeon starting from floor 1. Although floor progression and character level will be reset, aetherpool arm and gear strength will remain unchanged. Please note, however, that data cannot be restored once deleted.
target: It is possible to reset your progression in the Palace of the Dead, allowing you to re-enter the deep dungeon starting from floor 1. Although floor progression and character level will be reset, aetherpool arm and gear strength will remain unchanged. Please note, however, that data cannot be restored once deleted.

source: Fixed Parties
target: Fixed Parties

source: Disbanding Fixed Parties
target: Disbanding Fixed Parties

source:
It is possible to convert fixed party save data to matched party save data, allowing you to be matched automatically with other players via the matching system. Please note that all special items (pomanders) will be lost upon converting your data.

Once saved data from a fixed party is converted, it can only be used when selecting matched party. It cannot be restored to its original state.
target:
It is possible to convert fixed party save data to matched party save data, allowing you to be matched automatically with other players via the matching system. Please note that all special items (pomanders) will be lost upon converting your data.

Once saved data from a fixed party is converted, it can only be used when selecting matched party. It cannot be restored to its original state.

source: Entry After Disbanding
target: Entry After Disbanding

source:
Although players can no longer enter as a fixed party after converting their saved data, it is still possible to create preformed parties as long as the party is formed before entering the Palace of the Dead. The progression of all party members must be identical when doing so. Any open party slots will be filled automatically via the matching system.

Please note that a matched party cannot be used to challenge floors beyond floor 100.
target:
Although players can no longer enter as a fixed party after converting their saved data, it is still possible to create preformed parties as long as the party is formed before entering the Palace of the Dead. The progression of all party members must be identical when doing so. Any open party slots will be filled automatically via the matching system.

Please note that a matched party cannot be used to challenge floors beyond floor 100.

source: Party Progression
target: Party Progression

source: Players who have not progressed to the same floor cannot enter the Palace of the Dead together as a party. Those on earlier floors must use the matching system on their own. Once all players have reached the same floor, they can proceed together until floor 100 by forming a party and choosing to enter as a matched party.
target: Players who have not progressed to the same floor cannot enter the Palace of the Dead together as a party. Those on earlier floors must use the matching system on their own. Once all players have reached the same floor, they can proceed together until floor 100 by forming a party and choosing to enter as a matched party.

source: Aetherpool Gear
target: Aetherpool Gear

source: About Aetherpool Gear
target: About Aetherpool Gear

source: Players must use aetherpool armor and arms in place of normal gear when inside the Palace of the Dead. They will be equipped automatically upon entering, and can then be strengthened as you progress through the dungeon.
target: Players must use aetherpool armor and arms in place of normal gear when inside the Palace of the Dead. They will be equipped automatically upon entering, and can then be strengthened as you progress through the dungeon.

source: Upgrading Aetherpool Gear
target: Upgrading Aetherpool Gear

source:
Aetherpool gear can be enhanced by accessing silver coffers. These coffers are found randomly on each floor and after defeating certain enemies.

The maximum strength of aetherpool gear may be restricted depending on your class or job level and current progression in the deep dungeon. This can be confirmed when viewing the Character Info window.

Aetherpool gear enhancements will not carry over from one deep dungeon to another.
target:

Aetherpool gear enhancements will not carry over from one deep dungeon to another.

source: Gear Restrictions
target: Gear Restrictions

source: Under certain circumstances, you may be unable to join a matched party due to insufficient gear strength. In such cases, it may be necessary to resume your exploration of the Palace of the Dead from floor 1 to ensure your aetherpool gear is of sufficient strength.
target: Under certain circumstances, you may be unable to join a matched party due to insufficient gear strength. In such cases, it may be necessary to resume your exploration of the Palace of the Dead from floor 1 to ensure your aetherpool gear is of sufficient strength.

source: Pomanders
target: Pomanders

source: Using Pomanders
target: Using Pomanders

source:
Players will, on occasion, obtain pomanders from treasure coffers in the Palace of the Dead. These items can be used by all party members once acquired. They have various effects such as revealing the entirety of a map or increasing the number of treasure coffers on a given floor. Effective use of these items will help ensure the situation is always to your advantage.

Pomanders that affect the map cannot be overwritten with the same item when their effect is already in play. Please note, however, that they will still be consumed upon use.

Pomanders cannot be taken outside of the deep dungeon. When in a matched party, they will be reset each time you enter the dungeon.

source: The Accursed Hoard
target: The Accursed Hoard

source: About the Accursed Hoard
target: About the Accursed Hoard

source: When exploring the Palace of the Dead, players will, on occasion, find pieces of the Accursed Hoard─treasure hidden and buried by the undead. Once found, players must remain stationary at the treasure's location for a fixed period of time to unearth the coffer.
target: When exploring the Palace of the Dead, players will, on occasion, find pieces of the Accursed Hoard─treasure hidden and buried by the undead. Once found, players must remain stationary at the treasure's location for a fixed period of time to unearth the coffer.

source: Finding the Accursed Hoard
target: Finding the Accursed Hoard

source:
Though it is not difficult to unearth pieces of the Accursed Hoard, their location cannot be discerned with the naked eye alone.

Players must make use of a certain pomander in order to sense the presence of hidden pieces of the Accursed Hoard.
target:
Though it is not difficult to unearth pieces of the Accursed Hoard, their location cannot be discerned with the naked eye alone.

Players must make use of a certain pomander in order to sense the presence of hidden pieces of the Accursed Hoard.

source: Appraisal
target: Appraisal

source: Pieces of the Accursed Hoard obtained in the Palace of the Dead will be moved to your inventory upon saving your progress and exiting the dungeon. To ascertain the true value of this treasure, you must speak with the expedition bishop at Quarrymill to have it properly appraised.
target: Pieces of the Accursed Hoard obtained in the Palace of the Dead will be moved to your inventory upon saving your progress and exiting the dungeon. To ascertain the true value of this treasure, you must speak with the expedition bishop at Quarrymill to have it properly appraised.

source: Scores
target: Scores

source: Individual and Party Scores
target: Individual and Party Scores

source:
When entering the deep dungeon as a fixed party, you will receive scores based on a number of factors such as highest floor reached and number of enemies slain. You will be assigned separate scores for both individual and team performance.

Please note that you cannot earn credit for previous floors when starting from floor 51. Starting from floor 1 will ensure the highest score possible.
target:

source: Rankings
target: Rankings

source: Your highest score from the deep dungeon will be saved and can be viewed at any time by speaking with the Wood Wailer expeditionary captain. Scores that exceed a certain threshold will be made viewable on the rankings page of the Lodestone.
target: Your highest score from the deep dungeon will be saved and can be viewed at any time by speaking with the Wood Wailer expeditionary captain. Scores that exceed a certain threshold will be made viewable on the rankings page of the Lodestone.

source: Heaven<var 1F /var>on<var 1F /var>High
target: Heaven<var 1F /var>on<var 1F /var>High

source: Entry
target: Entry

source:
You may enter Heaven<var 1F /var>on<var 1F /var>High solo or in a party of up to four players. When speaking with Kyusei, you will be given the option to enter with a fixed party or a matched party via the matching system.

To create a fixed party, the party leader must speak with Kyusei after forming a party of up to four players. Please note that all party members must have at least one unused save slot.

You must be a Disciple of War or Magic of level 61 or above to participate.

source: Leveling Up
target: Leveling Up

If your job or class level is below 90 upon entering the deep dungeon, experience points will be rewarded based on progress.

source: Applying to Adventurer Plate
target: Applying to Adventurer Plate

source:
You may apply gear set portraits to your adventurer plate.
※You must equip the corresponding gear set to apply its portrait.

■How to Apply a Gear Set Portrait to the Adventurer Plate
1. Select the portrait you wish to apply.
2. Choose “Apply to Adventurer Plate” from the subcommand menu.
3. Select “Yes” when the confirmation window appears.

Furthermore, you may also import and apply adventurer plate portrait settings to gear set portraits.
※Only portrait settings will be imported. Gear set settings will remain unchanged.

■How to Import Your Adventurer Plate Portrait Settings
1. Select the gear set portrait to which you would like to apply the settings.
2. Choose “Import Settings from Adventurer Plate” from the subcommand menu.
3. After reviewing the confirmation window, select “Confirm.”

3. After reviewing the confirmation window, select “Confirm.”

source: Pieces of the Accursed Hoard found in Heaven<var 1F /var>on<var 1F /var>High will be moved to your inventory upon saving your progress and exiting the dungeon. To ascertain the true value of this treasure, you must speak with the Confederate appraiser in Onokoro to have it properly appraised.
target: Pieces of the Accursed Hoard found in Heaven<var 1F /var>on<var 1F /var>High will be moved to your inventory upon saving your progress and exiting the dungeon. To ascertain the true value of this treasure, you must speak with the Confederate appraiser in Onokoro to have it properly appraised.

source:
When entering the deep dungeon as a fixed party, you will receive scores based on a number of factors such as highest floor reached and number of enemies slain. You will be assigned separate scores for both individual and team performance.

Please note that you cannot earn credit for previous floors when starting from floor 51. Starting from floor 1 will ensure the highest score possible.
target:

source: Your highest score from the deep dungeon will be saved and can be viewed at any time by speaking with Kyusei. Scores that exceed a certain threshold will be made viewable on the rankings page of the Lodestone.
target: Your highest score from the deep dungeon will be saved and can be viewed at any time by speaking with Kyusei. Scores that exceed a certain threshold will be made viewable on the rankings page of the Lodestone.

source: The Clockwork Castletown
target: The Clockwork Castletown

source: Turn the tricks and traps of this Far Eastern labyrinth to your advantage─if you can. What surprises lurk within its glamour-woven walls?
target: Оберните ловушки этого восточного лабиринта в свою пользу─И победите. Что же скрывается за этими гламурными стенами?

source:
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>■Trick Floors■<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Standing upon a trick floor for too long will trigger a Tatami Twist, launching the unwitting loiterer into the air and inflicting damage. If your Guard is active, it will be depleted by the effort of staying upright.
target:
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>■Пружинные татами■<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Простояв на таком полу слишком долго спровоцирует переворот татами, запуская всех кто стоит на нем в воздух, нанося урон при приземлении. Если Guard активен, то он будет снят, но вы останетесь на земле.

source:
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>■Trick Door■<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Players who approach these false gates will find themselves teleported instantly to another door, far away from the expected trajectory. Trick doors only operate in one direction, so attempting to return the way you came will prove fruitless, and players may discover that passage is denied entirely whilst executing certain actions.
target:
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>■Потайные двери■<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Те, кто пройдет через них окажется на другой стороне, вдали от ожидаемой траектории. Такие двери работают только в одном направлении, а потому попытки вернуться обратно окажутся тщетными. Но проход не работает при использовании определенных действий.

source:
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>■Pneumatic Parades■<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
When a pneumatic parade begins, the clockwork onmyoji and clockwork yojimbo will join the fray. These puppets travel a predetermined path through the arena and unleash their unique attacks upon arriving in the vicinity of the centerpoint, checkpoints, and goals.

While the clockwork yojimbo will obliterate its surroundings with strong physical damage, the clockwork onmyoji quietly seeks unsuspecting players. Those unfortunate enough to meet its gaze will be greatly shrunk in size and suffer the following effects:
　・Decreased damage dealt and movement speed
　・Increased damage taken
target:
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>■Пневматические парады■<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
После начала парада, clockwork Onmyoji и заводной Йоджимбо присоединятся к битве. Эти куклы будут идти по заданному маршруту на арене и будут использовать свои особые атаки по достижению центра арены, контрольных точек и финишных точек.

Заводной Йоджимбо наносит невероятный урон вокруг себя, а clockwork Onmyoji будет искать ничего не подозревающих игроков. И те что встретятся с ним взглядом будут уменьшены в размере и будут страдать от следующих эффектов:
　・Уменьшенный наносимый урон и скорость передвижения
　・Повышенный получаемый урон

source:
During the midst of the parade, infamous soy sauce mogul Kageyama will make his grand appearance upon a stage outside the arena, and shower combatants with glimmering coin. Players who get their hands on a pile of gold will enjoy the following effect:
　・A boost to the limit gauge
target:
В самом разгаре парада, объявится скверный магнат Кагеяма и начнёт осыпать арену блестящими монетами. Игроки которые подберут золотую груду получат следующий эффект:
　・Частичное заполнение шкалы запредельной способности

source: Island Sanctuary Furnishings
target: Island Sanctuary Furnishings

source: Furnishing Glamours
target: Furnishing Glamours

source: <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Furnishings may be placed on your island sanctuary as glamours, allowing you to further personalize your tropical hideaway.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target: <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Furnishings may be placed on your island sanctuary as glamours, allowing you to further personalize your tropical hideaway.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source:
■Placing Furnishing Glamours
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>The furnishings that appear on your island are glamours of furnishing items you own.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Select “Manage Furnishings” from the islekeep's index to place, color, or preview available furnishings.
target:
■Placing Furnishing Glamours
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>The furnishings that appear on your island are glamours of furnishing items you own.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Select “Manage Furnishings” from the islekeep's index to place, color, or preview available furnishings.

source:
You only need to possess one of any given furnishing item to place it as many times as you'd like on your island─within reason, of course.

There is a limit to the number of furnishing items allowed on your island at once. This number will increase as island development progresses.

Glamours may be placed in areas designated for furnishing. However, some existing furnishing items are not compatible with glamours and therefore cannot be placed anywhere on your island.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>You do not need prisms to place furnishing glamours, and furnishing items will remain in your inventory even after you have placed them as glamours. However, please note that placing a glamour will bind the furnishing item to you, preventing future trade or sale to other players.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

■Registering Glamours
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Island prisms may be used to register furnishing glamours.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Registered glamours may be placed as many times as desired via the Registered Glamours list, which can be toggled to from the Furnishing Glamours window.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>You may register up to 120 furnishing glamours.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

You can register a furnishing glamour in the following ways:
①Via the subcommand of the item while managing island furnishings
②Via the subcommand of the glamour in your Placed Glamours list
③Via the prompt when placing a glamour
④Via the prompt when removing a glamour

■Coloring Glamours
Furnishing glamours may be painted by selecting “Manage Furnishings” from the islekeep's index, followed by “Color Furnishing Glamours.”

As with regular furnishings, dye is required to change the color of furnishing glamours.
target:

There is a limit to the number of furnishing items allowed on your island at once. This number will increase as island development progresses.

Glamours may be placed in areas designated for furnishing. However, some existing furnishing items are not compatible with glamours and therefore cannot be placed anywhere on your island.

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>You do not need prisms to place furnishing glamours, and furnishing items will remain in your inventory even after you have placed them as glamours. However, please note that placing a glamour will bind the furnishing item to you, preventing future trade or sale to other players.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Furnishing glamours may be painted by selecting “Manage Furnishings” from the islekeep's index, followed by “Color Furnishing Glamours.”

As with regular furnishings, dye is required to change the color of furnishing glamours.
